title: Aval al nou sector Pardinyes-Corbins, amb més d’un miler de nous habitatges
creator: webmaster@elpuntavui.cat (I.Casellas)
content: La Comissió territorial d’Urbanisme de Lleida ha emès aquest dimecres l’informe favorable a l’avanç del Pla parcial urbanístic que preveu desenvolupar un nou sector a la ciutat de Lleida, en continuïtat amb els barris del Secà de Sant Pere, Balàfia i Pardinyes, amb més d’un miler de nous habitatges, dels quals 445 amb protecció oficial. El Pla, que impulsa la Paeria, suposarà la continuació natural de la ciutat pel nord-est i permetrà relligar el centre i aquests barris, així com donar resposta a les necessitats d’habitatge detectades en aquesta part de la ciutat. L’àmbit és l’anomenat sector SUR-20, de 16,78 hectàrees de superfície, ubicat al nord del centre urbà en continuïtat amb Prat de la Riba. Actualment, els terrenys es destinen a activitats agrícoles, residencials i magatzems. Així, existeixen diverses edificacions aïllades, un petit conjunt anomenat Pardinyes Atles i la deixalleria municipal. La carretera C-12, porta d’entrada a Lleida, travessa el sector i es converteix en l’avinguda Prat de la Riba. L’estudi realitzat dels barris consolidats i limítrofs posa de manifest la manca d’habitatge disponible. Tenint en compte aquests factors, l’avanç del Pla proposa completar la trama urbana en el límit nord-est del nucli urbà amb un creixement natural en continuïtat als barris existents, amb 1.091 nous habitatges, dels quals 445 seran de protecció oficial. La trama urbana es configura en superilles amb placetes i petits jardins al seu...

title: Ven riesgoso seguir el modelo de AMLO
creator: Agencia Reforma
content: MONTERREY, NL.- Instituciones de análisis global advirtieron riesgos para México si la nueva Presidenta Claudia Sheinbaum sigue con la estrategia de su antecesor, Andrés Manuel López Obrador, pues podría complicar la economía del País. «Continuar con la estrategia de AMLO sin ajustarla podría aumentar los riesgos fiscales, externos y de productividad, lo que podría socavar los objetivos redistributivos de Sheinbaum», señaló el analista Alejandro Werner en un documento publicado por el Instituto Peterson de Economía Internacional (PIIE, por sus siglas en inglés). Agregó que el nuevo Gobierno federal tendrá un comienzo complicado, ya que es probable que la economía mexicana entre en recesión en el 2025 debido a una serie de factores. «Esta contracción estará impulsada por la desaceleración tradicional que se produce en el primer año de cada nueva Administración en México debido a la incertidumbre sobre los cambios de política y temas regulatorios. «(También por) la contracción presupuestaria necesaria para que las finanzas públicas vuelvan a una senda sostenible, la importante incertidumbre creada por la implementación de la reforma judicial y las perspectivas de una presidencia de Donald Trump y la renegociación del T-MEC en términos que no serían favorables para México», detalló. Precisó que a mediano plazo el crecimiento podría verse afectado por la reforma judicial, pues aumenta la imprevisibilidad de los resultados legales y reduce la...

title: Рискът за Европа от войната в Близкия изток - не мигрантска вълна, а тероризъм
content: Непосредственият риск за Европа и в частност за България от конфликта в Близкия изток е тежка хуманитарна криза и вълна от терористични действия. Това коментира Атанас Русев, директор на програма „Сигурност“ в Център за изследване на демокрацията (ЦИД), в предаването „В развитие“ по Bloomberg TV Bulgaria. На този етап не може да се опасяваме от голяма мигрантска вълна, подобна на тази отпреди десет години със сирийските бежанци, посочи той, като добави, че ситуацията е много различна от тогава. През последната седмица Близкият изток се тресе. Израел започна сухопътна акция в Ливан, а през нощта на 1 срещу 2 октомври Иран нанесе въздушни удари по Израел. Назрелият конфликт между „Хизбула“ и Израел заплашва още повече Ливан, държава, която от 2019 г. е в тежка икономическа криза. Страната е изправена на ръба на още по-тежка криза, която заплашва малкото ресурси, които я поддържат на повърхността. Според Атанас Русев през следващите месеци ще бъде отключена тежка хуманитарна криза. „Ако се стигне до пълномащабни сухоземни операции, вероятно ще има още повече разселени хора. По данни на агенциите на ООН от началото на конфликта с „Хизбула“ има близо 400 хиляди вътрешно разселени, а 100 хиляди души са пресекли границата със Сирия“, посочи гостът. Той отбеляза, че Турция не е подготвена да пропуска бежанци. „В това отношение Ливан е в голяма степен в положението на Газа – тези хора са просто заклещени на тази територия и очакваме тежка хуманитарна криза“, каза събеседникът....

title: Suisse. Les enfants attaqués à Zurich hors de danger, l'agresseur en détention préventive

L'un des garçons avait été grièvement blessé , selon les première indications mardi, les deux autres plus légèrement lors de l'attaque qui s'est produite dans un paisible quartier résidentiel du nord de Zurich. title: Dries Mertens voor blok gezet: 'Het is nu of nooit!'
creator: VoetbalNieuws
content: Kat Kerkhofs begint de komende weken aan één van haar 'wildste avonturen ooit'. De vrouw van Dries Mertens is immers te zien in het nieuwe seizoen van Over de Oceaan en daarin moest ze heel wat angsten weerstaan. Op privé-vlak kwam er van Kat uit nu een dwingende boodschap richting Dries. Verheyen als grote voorbeeld Over de Oceaan is in de loop der jaren uitgegroeid tot één van de kaskrakers van Play4. Vorig jaar konden we nog aanschouwen dat Gert Verheyen helemaal ontbolsterde tot een echte 'reality-ster'. Een bericht gedeeld door Verheyen Gert (@verheyengert7) Sindsdien wordt Verheyen nog wat vaker gevraagd voor allerhande entertainmentprogramma's, iets wat hem duidelijk ook goed ligt. In De Slimste Mens ter Wereld gaf hij onder meer het beste van zichzelf. In dit seizoen gaan onder meer Kat Kerkhofs, Steven Van Gucht en Riadh Bahri samen op stap. Dat levert ook nu weer fantastische televisie op. Kat zelf gaf eerder al aan dat ze wel 'heel wat angsten' had voor het vertrek. Zo was er onder meer de schrik om zoontje Ciro nooit meer te zien. Een bericht gedeeld door Streamz (@streamz.be) "Het einde is..." We kunnen iedereen alvast geruststellen: Kat is nog steeds onder de levenden. En dat zal ook manlief Dries geweten hebben. De twee hebben met Ciro al een zoontje maar... ...ook een tweede kind is meer dan welkom. " Dries en ik hebben altijd gezegd dat we meer dan één kind willen. Maar gecombineerd met in het buitenland wonen en met mijn werk, is dat niet zo simpel....

title: На Украине предсказали резкий рост тарифов на электроэнергию
creator: Дмитрий Воронин
content: В течение двух-трех лет на Украине произойдет удвоение тарифов на электроэнергию, следует из комментария председателя Союза потребителей коммунальных услуг страны Олега Попенко, на который ссылается ТАСС . С учетом того, что с 1 июня тариф для населения был установлен на уровне 4,32 гривны (0,1 доллара) за киловатт-час, предсказанное экспертом резкое повышение до диапазона в 8-9 гривен увеличит плату за свет для украинцев как раз примерно в два раза. При этом уже в 2025 году стоимость киловатт-часа для граждан составит 6,5-7 гривен. Ранее в республиканском Центре противодействия дезинформации заявили , что зимой на Украине электроэнергия может отсутствовать по 12-20 часов в сутки в зависимости от обстоятельств. По словам министра энергетики республики Германа Галущенко , страна потеряла половину вырабатывающих мощностей. Из-за проблем с энергогенерацией ведомство решило импортировать электричество из Польши , Словакии , Румынии , Венгрии и Молдавии .

title: Jovencito muere ahogado en jagüey de San Martín de las Pirámides
content: San Martín de las Pirámides/Estado de México Bomberos de San Martín de las Pirámides lograron rescatar el cuerpo de un joven de 20 años de edad que cayó a un jagüey de la comunidad de Palapa, en San Martín de las Pirámides. El joven identificado como Bryan “N” habría acudido con un acompañante al cuerpo de agua; aparentemente estaban intentando pescar, pero en un descuido cayó. Debido al fango el joven no logró salir con vida y fue cuando se solicitó el auxilio de los elementos de Protección Civil municipal. Ante la complejidad del rescate, se pidió la intervención de los Bomberos Voluntarios Pirámides, quienes llegaron al lugar y después de 30 minutos lograron recuperar el cuerpo. Elementos de seguridad pública municipal resguardaron el área mientras esperaban la llegada del Ministerio Público, quien se encargó del levantamiento del cuerpo y las diligencias correspondientes.

title: Will There Be A Fourth Season Of 'Industry'?
creator: Elle
content: As the latest TV drama to grip viewers across the globe, HBO's has been going from strength to strength since its debut in 2020. The compelling follows a group of graduates working at Pierpoint & Co, a prestigious investment bank in . Navigating the volatility of the industry, the must deal with rambunctious colleagues and employers, wild , demanding clients, and all while dealing with their own personal circumstances. During the third season, the show moved to HBO's most coveted primetime slot – 9pm on Sundays – which further confirms the show's success status. Therefore, it's a no brainer that the show will be making its return for a fourth season. To find out everything that there is to know about Industry season four including the cast, spoilers, release date, keep reading. Fans of the gripping show will be happy to hear that has been confirmed for a fourth season. On September 19, 2024 HBO announced the renewal of the series and that a fourth season will definitely be happening. The series creators, writers, directors and executive producers, Mickey Down and Konrad Kay, expressed their gratitude towards the renewal in a statement. 'We are beyond thrilled and grateful to HBO, the incredible team at Bad Wold and our phenomenal cast and crew for their continued belief in Industry and for allowing us to grow as creators, writers and now directors whilst taking the show to new heights. We can't wait to dive deeper and deliver the best season yet in season 4,' they stated....

title: Results and round-up for North Wales Road Runners this week
content: North Wales Road Runners turned out twelve members at Conwy this week, which included Mark Davies, and Daniel Owens, a partially sighted athlete, who was guided this week by Gwyn Williams (Colwyn Bay AC). Sion Thomas led the club team home in 17th place and finished 1st in his VM40 age cat in 22.10, with Karl Morris 20th, and 2nd in the same cat as Sion, and just seven-seconds adrift in 22.17. Steve Roberts was 32nd in 23.29, with Hannah Griffith 78th in 26.15, and she won her VW50 age cat, with master veteran Rob Fryer 87th and 2nd in his VM70 cat in 26.37. Fellow master Don Hale struggled a bit this week and he finished 3rd in the same age cat as Rob, in 104th place in 27.27. Veteran Len Jackson ran his fastest parkrun this year with a positive outing despite the conditions in 27.55 in 116th place and he was 4th in his VM65 cat, with Daniel Owens and his guide Gwyn Williams running home together in 125th place in a shared time of 28.12. Another master vet Mark Mason also finished 4th in his VM70 cat in 29.06 in 135th place, and deserved plaudits were also given to recovering club athletes Carla Green and Elizabeth Driscoll, with Carla finishing in 228th place in 35.18, Mark Davies 246th in 36.35, and Elizabeth finishing 272nd in 49.06. Road Runner Llyr ApGeraint-Roberts finished 3rd in the Llandudno Duathlon on Sunday following a tremendous performance over a very tough and challenging course, which included both a 5k and 10k run, interspersed by four bike laps around the...

title: Was folgt nach Irans Raketenangriff auf Israel?
Michael Schumacher’s former manager reveals why he didn’t visit him in hospital
creator: Louis Sealey
content: Michael Schumacher ’s former manager still regrets not visiting the Formula One legend in hospital after his devastating skiing accident. Schumacher, a seven-time world champion , suffered severe and life-changing head injuries while skiing in December 2013 . The German was placed in a medically induced coma for over a year and after further rehabilitation relocated to his home where he has received medical treatment privately since September 2014. Willi Weber managed several German racing drivers, including Schumacher, for over a decade but did not visit him in hospital as he wrongly assumed reports of the injury were ‘exaggerated’. Weber, now 82, says he presumed and hoped ‘everything would be fine’ but quickly regretted his decision. Opening up on his relationship with Schumacher, Weber told German publication Bild : ‘I’m thinking about my successes with Michael – our goals and our victories. ‘I remember Michael the way he was. And we probably won’t see each other again. ‘It was my fault that I didn’t visit Michael after the accident and stand by him. Because I thought the media reports were exaggerated. ‘I thought I’d better wait a few days and then everything would be fine. But it was too late. For a long time I blamed myself for not reacting immediately. ‘Since then, I’ve said goodbye to Michael in my heart in order to find my peace again.’ The full extent of Schumacher’s injury has never been made public but he has lived in total secrecy ever since. It was reported...

title: Spadki po otwarciu sesji w USA
content: Po pierwszym dzwonku na Wall Street i Nasdaq, trzy benchmarkowe indeksy zauważalnie tracą na wartości, a spadkowej stawce przewidzi Nasdaq Composite. Po około kwadransie notowań zniżkował o 0,74 proc. Nieco mniejsza strata była udziałem indeksu szerokiego rynku S&P500, sięgała 0,58 proc. Najlżejszy cios przyjmuje średnia przemysłowa Dow Jones, zniżkując o 0,25 proc. Obawy o eskalację konfliktu na Bliskim Wschodzie ciążą na nastrojach rynkowych i negatywnie przekładają się na decyzje podejmowane przez inwestorów. . Jednocześnie raport ADP zaskoczył silniejszym niż oczekiwano wzrostem zatrudnienia, co wskazuje, że rynek pracy pozostaje silny. Po tej publikacji, szanse na kolejną, 50-punktową redukcję stopy funduszy federalnych w listopadzie spadły do ​​34 proc. znacznie poniżej poziomów powyżej 50 proc. w zeszłym tygodniu. Najgorzej radzą sobie dzisiaj sektory związane z dobrami konsumpcyjnymi. Tymczasem na tle spadającego rynku dobrze wypada sektor energetyczny, który korzysta z wyższych cen ropy naftowej. Silna, sięgająca momentami 3,5 proc. przecena dosięgła akcje Tesli po tym, jak amerykański producent elektrycznych samochodów nie spełnił oczekiwań dotyczących dostaw w trzecim kwartale. Ponad dwa razy mocniej zniżkuje kurs papierów Nike. To efekt negatywnej reakcji inwestorów na wycofanie swojej całorocznej prognozy przed zmianą kierownictwa.

title: Norwegia nie rozstanie się z gotówką ze względu na seniorów i względy bezpieczeństwa
content: Od 1 października żaden norweski przedsiębiorca nie może odmówić przyjęcia od klienta płatności w gotówce, o ile należność nie przekracza 20 tys. koron (ok.7,4 tys. zł). Nowe przepisy nie obejmują płatności w gabinetach lekarskich i w środkach komunikacji publicznej. Ministra sprawiedliwości i spraw wewnętrznych Emilie Enger Mehl w rozmowie ze stacją TV2 przyznała, że nie wszyscy korzystali z ucyfrowienia płatności. Według ostatnich badań nawet 600 tys. Norwegów świadomie nie korzysta z elektronicznych rozwiązań płatniczych. To ponad 10 proc. ludności kraju; większość stanowią seniorzy. "Musimy zwrócić się ku osobom, które mają trudności z korzystaniem z cyfrowych środków płatniczych. W dzisiejszym świecie łatwo zapomnieć, że istnieje duża grupa ludzi, którzy cyfrowi nie są" - podkreśliła Enger Mehl. Jak dodała, powrót do tradycyjnego pieniądza ma przygotować Norwegię na możliwą awarię systemów płatności elektronicznych - zarówno z przyczyn technicznych, jak i przez ingerencję służb specjalnych innych państw czy grup hakerskich. W takich wypadkach gotówka jest, według Enger Mehl, najbezpieczniejszym rozwiązaniem. Wątpliwości wyrazili jednak księgowi. Regnskap Norge, największa w Norwegii izba gospodarcza zrzeszająca specjalistów w zakresie rachunkowości, w wydanym komunikacie nazywa nowe przepisy "upominkiem dla przestępców". Dyrektor generalny izby Rune Aale-Hansen podkreślił, że to właśnie świat...

title: Podsumowanie najważniejszych tematów Warsaw Security Forum [WIDEO]
Pete Rose, who died Monday, very nearly signed with the Royals in the 1970s
creator: Kansas City Star
content: After losing to the Yankees for a third straight year in the American League Championship Series, the Royals sought to upgrade their roster following the 1978 season. So a few days after Thanksgiving, one of the most sought-after free agents stopped in Kansas City. Pete Rose. Rose, who , was coming off a season in which he batted .302, led the National League with 51 doubles and made his 12th All-Star appearance in 16 seasons with the Reds. Cincinnati had elected to let Rose leave as a free agent, likely because he was 37 years old at the time. Rose, who had the nickname “Charlie Hustle,” met with Royals founder Ewing Kauffman and general manager Joe Burke. “I’m really impressed. Kansas City made me a tremendous offer,” Rose told The Star after visiting with the Royals’ top decision-makers. “It’s something I’m going to have to talk to my attorney about. It’s a first-class operation and a tremendous team that wins its division often. The secret to happiness is winning.” Rose was playing third base at the time, and the Royals were set at that position with George Brett. But the Royals had a plan that appealed to Rose. “Whitey (Herzog) was not here, but my discussions with Joe Burke indicate I would be playing either in the outfield or on first base,” Rose told The Star at the time. “I would look forward to the opportunity to beat out Rod Carew as the All-Star first baseman. “Another advantage to playing with Kansas City would be the designated hitter rule. I am 37 years old...

title: RPP: po wygaśnięciu wpływu wzrostu cen energii inflacja powinna wrócić do celu NBP
content: W środę zakończyło się dwudniowe posiedzenie Rady Polityki Pieniężnej, na którym zdecydowała ona o niezmienianiu stóp procentowych Narodowego Banku Polskiego. Główna stopa NBP, stopa referencyjna, została utrzymana na poziomie 5,75 proc. „W ocenie Rady napływające dane wskazują, że pomimo obserwowanego ożywienia gospodarczego, presja popytowa i kosztowa w polskiej gospodarce pozostają relatywnie niskie, co w warunkach osłabionej koniunktury i niższej presji inflacyjnej za granicą oddziałuje w kierunku ograniczenia krajowej presji inflacyjnej” – czytamy w komunikacie opublikowanym przez RPP po posiedzeniu, w którym uzasadniła ona swoją decyzję. Rada oceniła, że ograniczająco na dynamikę cen konsumpcyjnych oddziałuje także umocnienie kursu złotego, które „jest spójne z fundamentami polskiej gospodarki”. „W kierunku wyższej presji cenowej w krajowej gospodarce oddziałuje natomiast wyraźny wzrost wynagrodzeń, w tym w związku z podwyżkami płac w sektorze publicznym” – stwierdziła RPP. Rada uznała, że inflacja jest „istotnie” podwyższana przez wzrost cen energii. Zdaniem jej członków, w najbliższych kwartałach ten czynnik będzie wpływał na wysokość wskaźnika wzrostu cen towarów i usług konsumpcyjnych w ujęciu rocznym. „Po wygaśnięciu wpływu wzrostu cen energii – przy obecnym poziomie stóp procentowych NBP – inflacja powinna powrócić do średniookresowego celu NBP, choć czynnikiem niepewności jest wpływ wyższych cen energii na...

title: ?Terzo caso di dengue a Ortona, al via disinfestazioni
content: Dopo il focolaio di Fano un terzo caso di Dengue relativo ad un paziente residente a Ortona (Chieti), in contrada San Donato, è stato comunicato al Comune dall'Unità operativa complessa Servizio igiene epidemiologica e sanità pubblica della Lanciano Vasto Chieti. il Commissario straordinario del Comune di Ortona ha adottato una nuova ordinanza «contingibile e urgente per l'attuazione di specifiche misure localizzate, utili a prevenire la trasmissione del virus». In particolare, è stato ordinato ad Eco.Lan spa di procedere alla disinfestazione per tre giorni consecutivi e per un raggio di almeno 200 metri dal luogo in cui la persona si è infettata, comprendendo sia le aree pubbliche che quelle private ovvero cortili, piazzali, giardini, terrazze. La disinfestazione avverrà in contrada San Donato nelle notti tra il 2 e 3, tra il 3 e 4 e tra il 4 e 5 ottobre, a partire dalle 21.30 fino alle 00.30. Essendo il servizio previsto anche nelle pertinenze private, come cortili, piazzali, giardini e terrazze, i residenti sono tenuti a consentire l'accesso agli addetti alla disinfestazione per l'effettuazione del trattamento. .

title: Kate Moss enjoys partying again on girls' nights out with younger sister Lottie (while boyfriend Nikolai is nowhere to be seen!)
content: Kate Moss enjoys partying again on girls' nights out with younger sister Lottie (while boyfriend Nikolai is nowhere to be seen!) By Laura Parkin For Mailonline Published: 10:46 EDT, 2 October 2024 | Updated: 10:52 EDT, 2 October 2024 e-mail 1 View comments She famously swapped partying for transcendental meditations, moonbathing and crystals, marking a new era for supermodel Kate Moss once known for her wild past. The icon gave up alcohol back in 2017 in favour of juice fasts and reformer Pilates, even selling her own range of teas and skincare products through her beauty and wellness brand, Cosmoss. But after ringing in her 50th birthday this year, it seems she's realised life is too short to be in bed by 11pm watching Netflix , and has made some fun girls nights out part of her wellness routine. Kicking off the year, she threw a raucous 50th birthday party in classic Kate style, with dancing until 2am, a makeshift catwalk and a 30-strong group of her closest A-list pals and fashion's finest names. Since then, she's been seen dancing wildly at a Stevie Nicks concert and celebrating her renewed relationship with sister Lottie, 26, by hitting the town together. Notably absent, however, is her younger boyfriend Count Nikolai Von Bismarck , 37, who has been sober since 2017 and has said he doesn't 'like being in any sort of limelight'. The couple were last seen in public together in June this year, attending the Dior show at Paris Fashion Week , but he's known to prefer quiet...

title: Benefit trend: Employers opt to give workers an allowance for health coverage
content: Dave Lantz is no stranger to emergency department or doctor bills. With three kids in their teens and early 20s, "when someone gets sick or breaks an arm, all of a sudden you have thousand-dollar medical bills," Lantz said. The family's health plan that he used to get as the assistant director of physical plant at Lycoming College, a small liberal arts school in central Pennsylvania, didn't start to cover their costs until they had paid $5,600 in medical bills. The Lantzes were on the hook up to that annual threshold. The high-deductible plan wasn't ideal for the family of five, but it was the only coverage option available to them. Things are very different now. In mid-2022, the college ditched its group health plan and replaced it with a new type of plan — an individual coverage health reimbursement arrangement, or ICHRA. Now Lantz gets a set amount from his employer every month that he puts toward a family plan on the individual insurance market. He opted for a zero-deductible plan with a richer level of coverage than the group plan. Though its $790 monthly premium is higher than the $411 he used to pay, he ends up saving money overall by not having to pay down that big deductible. Plus, he now has more control over his health spending. "It's nice to have the choice to balance the high deductible versus the higher premium," Lantz said. Before, "it was tough to budget for that deductible." As health insurance costs continue to rise, employers are eyeing this type of health...

title: Michael Schumacher al matrimonio della figlia, prima apparizione pubblica dopo 11 anni
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Michael Schumacher , leggendario campione di Formula 1, è stato visto in pubblico per la prima volta dopo 11 anni in occasione del matrimonio della figlia Gina . La 27enne si è unita ad Iain Bethke in una cerimonia che si è tenuta nella villa di famiglia a Maiorca. I media tedeschi hanno riferito che Michael era presente per assistere al lieto evento. Schumacher continua ad aver bisogno di cure mediche costanti dopo il suo incidente sugli sci che gli ha cambiato la vita. Una grave caduta mentre sciava sulle Alpi francesi, in seguito alla quale ha sbattuto la testa su una roccia. E' sopravvissuto miracolosamente, ma il sette volte pilota ha trascorso diversi mesi in coma farmacologico. Da quando gli è stato permesso di tornare nella casa di famiglia sul lago di Ginevra nel settembre 2014, è stato curato dalla moglie Corinna e da un team di professionisti. La consorte ha permesso solo a un gruppo selezionato di amici fidati e familiari di fargli visita periodicamente. Gli unici, oltre la famiglia, che conoscono dettagli delle sue condizioni e delle sue cure. La presenza di Michael al matrimonio della figlia potrebbe indicare un cambiamento nella posizione della moglie. Sebbene sia già stato trasportato dalla casa di famiglia alla villa di Maiorca, questa volta è stato diverso, perché è apparso di fronte a tutti gli altri invitati alle nozze di Gina. Gli invitati, per precauzione, hanno consegnato i loro cellulari per evitare a monte l'uscita di foto non autorizzate.

title: Gennaro Montuori ricorda Luciano Vivenzio: "Pagine azzurre bellissime, l'uomo nero le strappò"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Gennaro Montuori , ex capo Ultras partenopeo, ha ricordato Luciano Vivenzio , scomparso in queste ore. Queste le sue parole: "Buon viaggio amico mio Luciano Vivenzio, per tutti Re Cecconi: che Dio ti abbia in gloria. Eravamo poco più che bambini ed insieme con Tonino Faiello, Sandro Sanges, Giorgio Ciccarelli, Lillone, Pino Ursumanno, Nicola Giuliano e tanti altri amici iniziammo a scrivere delle pagine azzurre bellissime. Poi arrivò l'uomo nero e le strappò". Poi ha aggiunto: "Amavi sventolare le bandiere come pochi tifosi azzurri lo sanno fare: solo Sandro Sanges e Mario Del Re cercavano di essere al tuo passo... Rip amico mio dal cuore diviso a metà, insieme mille battaglie con aneddoti indimenticabili, una vita di sacrifici e di sofferenze, meritavi molto di più. Gli angeli ti stanno aspettando per portarti nelle mani del signore. 'A Maronna t'accumpagn Pe' Cecco'.. ti voglio salutare come quando eravamo alle feste in famiglia ed i bambini piccolini ti chiamavano così".

title: Corbo: "Conte deve dire certe cose, i tifosi sanno perché. Ma la verità sul Napoli è evidente"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Antonio Corbo , editorialista di Repubblica, ha rilasciato alcune dichiarazioni a Radio Marte nel corso di Forza Napoli Sempre. Queste le sue parole: "I tifosi del Napoli sono così arguti che Conte dice certe cose perché deve dirle, perché deve mitigare questa atmosfera entusiasta. Non dico che bisogna suonare la grancassa, ma secondo me è giusto che i tifosi sognino. Ed è corretto anche perché la verità è evidente, ovvero il sogno non è utopia, questo Napoli è veramente forte. E’ capace anche di battere i deboli, come è capitato col Monza". Ed ha aggiunto: "I tifosi hanno capito che se va tutto bene il Napoli può vincere davvero questo titolo. Il Napoli ha contenuti importanti, i calciatori stanno tutti sul pezzo, giocano con la vittoria cucita sulla pelle. Bisogna assecondare questa squadra, che ha carattere ed è, grazie a Conte, una schiacciasassi. Insomma i mezzi per lottare, in anticipo sui programmi, per lo scudetto li ha eccome, grazie anche agli investimenti di De Laurentiis. Secondo me Lukaku non deve essere messo a confronto con Osimhen, perché ormai il nigeriano fa parte del passato e soprattutto, in modo ostinato, non ha voluto restare a Napoli. Invece il belga è uno che sta con piacere in azzurro e va sostenuto".

title: HBO naśmiewa się z kina superbohaterskiego. Ten nowy serial obejrzycie jeszcze w październiku
content: HBO opublikowało oficjalny zwiastun oryginalnego serialu komediowego „Franczyza" . Produkcja ta zadebiutuje w poniedziałek 7 października w HBO i w serwisie Max. Co tydzień na platformie Max i na antenie HBO będzie dostępny kolejny, premierowy odcinek. Finał serialu przewidziany jest na 24 listopada. "Franczyza" to pełna kąśliwego humoru satyra na przemysł filmowy. Serial podąża za ekipą twórców pracujących nad filmem o superbohaterach, który ma się okazać kolejnym hitem kinowym. Produkcja rzuca światło na chaos panujący za kulisami i próbuje odpowiedzieć na pytanie - jak dokładnie powstaje kinowa papka dla mas. Pomysłodawcą serialu jest Sam Mendes. Obsada: Himesh Patel (Daniel), Aya Cash (Anita), Jessica Hynes (Steph), Billy Magnussen (Adam), Lolly Adefope (Dag), Darren Goldstein (Pat) i Isaac Powell (Bryson). W serialu gościnne wystąpią Richard E. Grant (Peter) i Daniel Brühl (Eric). Twórcy: producentami wykonawczymi są Sam Mendes, Pippa Harris, Nicolas Brown i Julie Pastor (Neal Street Productions); Armando Iannucci (Dundee Productions); Jon Brown i Jim Kleverweis. Pilot został wyreżyserowany przez Sama Mendesa i napisany przez Jona Browna, który pełni również funkcję showrunnera. Serial "Franczyza" już od 7 października w serwisie Max i na antenie HBO.

title: Sky, Modugno: "Il Napoli si sta avvicinando all'Inter per valori"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Inter come punto di riferimento per chiunque voglia seriamente lottare per lo Scudetto. La classifica ci dice che il Napoli , oggi, è la squadra da battere, ma per riuscire e restare lassù fino all'ultimo, gli uomini di Antonio Conte dovranno dimostrare di avere la costanza messa in campo dai nerazzurri l'anno scorso o dallo stesso Napoli in passato, quando Luciano Spalletti tirò fuori il massimo da quasi tutti i calciatori a sua disposizione. Francesco Modugno , giornalista Sky , a microfoni di Radio Marte ha parlato della corsa al titolo in questa stagione. "Il Napoli si sta avvicinando all'Inter per valori, ma non è più l'Inter della scorsa stagione: appare orientata più verso l'Europa, anche inconsapevolmente, perché presa dalla Champions. L'obiettivo è quello di ritrovarsi a marzo-aprile stando lassù: a quel punto, te la giochi. Il Napoli vuole tornare nella dimensione europea che gli è stata propria per anni e che vuole ritrovare: quella è la grande ambizione. In un campionato senza squadroni, però, te la puoi giocare anche tu" ha affermato.

title: Дни преди премиерата на филма за Гунди излиза и книга за легендата
content: Нов тираж на книгата „Гунди – какъвто не го познавате“ излиза дни преди премиерата на биографичния филм за футболиста „Гунди – легенда да любовта“ . Томът включва 28 истории за спортиста, съобщават издателите от „Труд“. Автори на „Гунди – какъвто не го познавате“ са Кристиан Иванов, Елица Младенова, Добромир Добрев и Георги Иванов. Те са подбрали в първата част на книгата 28 момента от живота на Георги Аспарухов–Гунди - от раждането му до датата на смъртта му - 30 юни 1971 г., когато с Никола Котков загиват в катастрофа при прохода „Витиня“. За изданието са предоставени авторски снимки на Петър Спасов. В „Гунди – какъвто не го познавате“ има още лични истории на съпругата на футболиста – Лита, на сина му Андрей, на Янка Рупкина, на Стефан Аладжов и др. Животът на Георги Аспарухов е във фокуса и на игралния филм „ Гунди – легенда да любовта“ . Режисьор е Димитър Димитров, а в главната роля е Павел Иванов. Премиерата на филма ще бъде на 9 октомври в „Арена София“, а от 18 октомври продукцията тръгва по кината. Оператор е Борис Славков, а музиката е на Георги Стрезов. В актьорския състав на филма са още Александра Свиленова, Пенко Господинов, Владимир Люцканов, Димитър Маринов, Николай Урумов, Параскева Джукелова, Александра Костова, Емил Марков и др.

title: Мениджърът на Лийдс с коментар за състоянието на Груев
content: Състоянието на един от най-важните играчи в момента в българския национален отбор Илия Груев не е никак добро, но все още е рано за окончателни прогнози, като предстои повторен преглед днес. Халфът на Лийдс бе сменен принудително още в 20-тата минута на мача на тима си с Норич от осмия кръг на Чемпиъншип. Двубоят завърши при резултат 1:1. "Той не беше в състояние да продължи мача. Става дума за контузия в коляното. Трудно ми е да прогнозирам, предпочитам да изчакам оценката на лекарите след прегледа днес", коментира пред Leeds Live мениджърът на тима Даниел Фарке. Ако опасенията за по-сериозна травма на 24-годишния Груев се потвърдят, то халфът със сигурност ще отпадне и от cметките на селекционера на България Илиан Илиев за предстоящите мачове от Лигата на нациите. На 12 октомври в Пловдив нашите приемат Люксембург, а три дни по-късно "лъвовете" гостуват на Северна Ирландия в Белфаст.

title: Владо Николов: Левски го очаква СуперОктомври
content: Президентът на волейболния Левски Владимир Николов представи инициативата на клуба "СуперОктомври", с която ще бъде даден старт на новия сезон за мъжкия и женския отбор на "сините". Николов е категоричен, че този сезон Левски ще продължи да се развива, като има огромни очаквания и към женския тим, от който се очаква да сложи край на хегемонията на Марица Пловдив в първенството. "Имам честта да представя СуперОктомври за нашия клуб. Нарекохме месеца така, защото започваме сезона с участие за Суперкупата, ще имаме две супер дербита с ЦСКА, женският отбор ще има супер среща с шампиона Марица, както и първи мач от европейските турнира. Продължава и кампанията "Стани съмишленик". Основният ни спонсор се ангажира да удвои всички събрани средства с идеята да продължаваме развитието на младите", каза Николов. "На някои може да им изглежда кратко, но за нас пътят дотук бе дълъг и труден. Категорично съм много доволен от развитието на Левски. Продължаваме да се разриваме и да надграждаме. Когато започвахме през 2016 имахме само един компромисен мъжки отбор и един юношески тим. Сега имаме силни мъжки и женски отбори, както и по четири отбора в двете направления във всички възрасти или общо 10 отбора. Опитваме се да се развиваме по най-добрия начин", добави президентът. "През миналата година имахме два случая, в които залата ни беше малка. Да се надяваме, че ще имаме повече поводи през този сезон и ако това стане, ще мислим за временни трибуни от двете страни на игрището, има...

title: Най-големите изненади в спорта и как са повлияли на прогнозите
content: Спортът е изпълнен с вълнуващи и неочаквани моменти, които често предизвикват огромни изненади и променят хода на събитията. Тези изненадващи резултати не само оказват влияние върху отборите и играчите, но също така разтърсват света на прогнозите. В тази статия ще разгледаме някои от най-големите изненади в спорта и как те са повлияли на очакванията и прогнозите на експертите и букмейкърите. Лестър Сити печели Висшата лига (2016) Едно от най-невероятните постижения в историята на футбола е спечелването на Висшата лига от Лестър Сити през сезон 2015/2016. Преди началото на сезона, букмейкърите даваха коефициент от 5000:1 за победа на Лестър, като никой не очакваше този малък клуб да конкурира гигантите на английския футбол като Манчестър Юнайтед, Челси и Манчестър Сити. източник: https://www.freepik.com/free-photo/high-angle-hand-holding-smartphone_32502937.htm Влияние върху прогнозите: Тази изненада напълно преобърна представите за "малките отбори" и техния потенциал в първенствата. След този успех, букмейкърите започнаха да преосмислят стратегиите си за оценка на шансовете на аутсайдери, като значително намалиха коефициентите за подобни изненади. Прогнозите вече взимат предвид повече фактори като стабилността на отбора и формата през сезона. Майк Тайсън губи от Бъстър Дъглас (1990) На 11 февруари 1990 г. светът на бокса бе шокиран, когато Майк Тайсън, тогава непобедим и световен шампион в тежка категория, загуби срещу Бъстър Дъглас. Коефициентите за победа на...

title: Байерн на Петър Гайдаров с втора поредна победа в Младежката Шампионска лига (видео)
content: Байерн Мюнхен записа втора поредна победа в Младежката Шампионска лига. Воденият от Петър Гайдаров отбор се наложи с 1:0 като гост над Астън Вила в мач от 2-ия кръг на турнира. Едиственият гол в мача вкара Йона Куси-Асаре. Шведският талант се разписа в 64-ата минута след страхотна асистенция на мароканския национал Адам Азну. JAAAAA! Wir holen uns den zweiten Sieg in der #UYL !👊 #FCBayern #MiaSanMia #UYL pic.twitter.com/pMSwOOz3zi — FC Bayern Campus (@fcbayerncampus) October 2, 2024

title: Фернандо Гаго ще бъде новият треньор на Бока Хуниорс
content: Старши треньорът на Гуадалахара Фернандо Гаго може да поеме Бока Хуниорс, съобщава журналистът Николо Шира. Според източника назначаването на 38-годишния аржентинец се очаква в близко бъдеще. Fernando #Gago is getting closer to become #BocaJuniors ’ new coach. #transfers — Nicolò Schira (@NicoSchira) October 2, 2024 Гаго се оттегли от игра през 2020 г. По време на кариерата си полузащитникът е играл за Бока Хуниорс, Валенсия, Реал Мадрид и Рома. Като треньор Гаго води аржентинските Алдосиви и Расинг Авелянеда. От януари 2024 г. Гаго е старши треньор на Гуадалахара. / БГНЕС

title: Станислав Генчев ще е вторият гост на подкаста на Левски
content: От Левски обявиха, че Станислав Генчев ще е вторият гост на подкаста "Гласът на Левски". Епизодът с наставника ще излезе в четвъртък, 3 октомври, от 16:00 часа в YouTube канала на "сините". Преди седмица беше даден старт на проекта, като в първия епизод говори собственикът на клуба Наско Сираков. Ето цялото съобщение на клуба: Готов ли си за "Гласът на Левски"? Ще ви срещнем с човека, който с работата си само за няколко месеца заслужи трибуните да скандират името му. Станислав Генчев ще разкрие всичко, което ви вълнува около отбора и живота си. Епизода гледайте в четвъртък, 3 октомври, от 16:00 часа в YouTube канала на "Левски". Очаквайте "Гласът на Левски" всеки четвъртък, за да видите клуба и отбора отвътре, както никога досега. подкрепя българския спорт

title: Ливърпул надцаква Ман Юнайтед през януари за защитник на Евертън
content: Английският футболен клуб Ливърпул ще опита да отмъкне трансферната цел на Манестър Юнайтед Джарад Брантуайт през януари, спекулира goal.com. "Червените" са обсъждали този ход още през лятото, но тогава не се стигна до оферта за централния защитник. Юнайтед е основен кандидат за подписа на Брантуайт от доста време, но първата оферта на "червените дяволи" е била отхвърлена. Според информация на "Дейли Мейл", тя е била на стойност 45 милиона паунда и допълнителни 5 милиона под формата на бонуси. 🚨 Liverpool have concrete interest Jarrad Branthwaite and could feasibly move for the defender in January. They are in a position to offer Everton closer to what they want than Manchester United did last summer. (Source: @ChrisWheelerDM ) pic.twitter.com/lmylrdGyHO — Transfer News Live (@DeadlineDayLive) October 1, 2024 Брантуайт има договор с Евертън до 2027. Ливърпул пък вече търси бъдещия заместник на Върджил ван Дайк, чието бъдеще на "Анфилд" е несигурно. Брантуайт, на 22 години, има 55 мача и четири гола за Евертън. Той има и едногодишен престой в нидерландското първенство с ПСВ Айндховен, за който има 36 двубоя и четири попадения. / БТА

title: Ливърпул хвърли око на олимпийски шампион
content: В радара на Ливърпул е попаднал защитникът на Севиля - Хуанлу Санчес, който стана олимпийски шампион с Испания това лято. 21-годишният футболист е гласен за алтернатива на Трент Александър-Арнолд в дясната зона на отбраната. Договорът на Хуанлу с андалусийците е до лятото на 2026 г., а цената му е около 25 милиона евро. Ако бъде привлечен, най-вероятно ще се търси нов отбор на Конър Брадли. Талантът от школата на мърсисайдци бе налаган от Юрген Клоп в края на престоя на германския специалист на „Анфийлд“, а през този сезон влиза предимно като резерва под ръководството на Арне Слот.

title: وزير الإقتصاد والتخطيط : “الدولة ستُساند الإستثمار والمستثمرين” (فيديو)
creator: دنيا الزغيدي
content: أدى اليوم الأربعاء 2 أكتوبر 2024 وزير الإقتصاد والتخطيط سمير عبد الحفيظ زيارة عمل إلى ولاية باجة. وقال الوزير في تصريح لمراسل “تونس الرقمية” بالجهة ان الدولة ستساند الإستثمار و المستثمرين وستسعى لتجاوز مختلف العراقيل الموجودة لدفع الاستثمار بالبلاد مضيفا “اهم عامل للنمو هو الاستثمار..وكسلط مركزية وجهوية من دورنا تدعيم الاستثمار وحلحلة العراقيل..في اطار القانون طبعا..وهذا ما سنعمل عليه”. وأكد الوزير أن الجهود التي تبذلها الشركات الأجنبية المتواجدة بالمنطقة تثبت ثقتها في المهارات التونسية وفي الموقع التونسي كوجهة استثمارية.

title: Hurricane Helene: a visual timeline of storm’s devastation
creator: The Guardian
content: slammed into Florida’s Gulf coast on Thursday night with winds above 140mph (225kmh) and a 15ft (4.5m) storm surge. The storm caused deadly flooding as it dumped almost unprecedented amounts of rain through Georgia and the Carolinas, to Tennessee, Virginia and Kentucky. Dozens were killed, communities wrecked or changed forever, and early estimates by insurance experts calculate losses at up to $160bn. Before unleashing its full fury on the continental US, Helene, the eighth named storm of the 2024 Atlantic hurricane season, spent several days building up strength over the warm waters of the Gulf of Mexico. Here is the timeline of one of the most deadly and costly hurricanes in recent memory: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) in Miami warned that a broad area of pressure over the northwestern Caribbean Sea, producing disorganized showers and thunderstorms, had “a high chance” of tropical development over the following two days. It posted tropical storm warnings for western Cuba and Mexico’s Yucatán peninsula, while noting the motion of the developing weather system was uncertain. After being classified as a tropical storm, the forecast track of Helene began to come into focus. An NHC advisory projected it “accelerating toward the northeastern Gulf coast through Thursday” after causing heavy rain, considerable flooding and mudslides across western Cuba overnight. Anticipating a severe impact, Ron DeSantis, Florida’s governor, to 61 of his state’s 67 counties, while Brian...

title: كيف تساهم منصة "فالكون-آي" في إدارة مواقف السيارات باستخدام الذكاء الاصطناعي؟ - BBC.com
JD Vance refuses to say Trump lost in 2020, downplays events of Jan. 6
content: In one of the most notable exchanges of the vice presidential debate, Republican candidate JD Vance refused to say former President Donald Trump lost the 2020 election and downplayed the events of Jan. 6, 2021, when a pro-Trump mob stormed the U.S. Capitol to try to stop the ceremonial certification of the results. The Ohio senator also declined to rule out challenging the outcome of the 2024 race, even if votes were certified by every state leader as legitimate. Minnesota Democratic Gov. Tim Walz, Vice President Kamala Harris' running mate, expressed exasperation and disbelief. He said such denialism had to stop because it was "tearing our country apart." The topic of democracy, a top issue for many voters this cycle, came up near the end of the 90-minute debate hosted by CBS News in New York City. MORE: Key takeaways from the Walz-Vance vice presidential debate Moderator Norah O'Donnell, noting there were no findings of widespread fraud in 2020, asked Vance about his past comment that he would not have certified the election if he had been vice president and instead would have asked states to submit alternate slate of electors. "That has been called unconstitutional and illegal," O'Donnell said. "Would you, again, seek to challenge this year's election results, even if every governor certifies the results?" Vance first sidestepped the question by saying he was "focused on the future" and criticized Harris, who he later claimed was the real "threat to democracy" as he...

title: Van 20 muertos por ‘John’ en Guerrero
creator: Agencia Reforma
content: CHILPANCINGO, Guerrero.- Al menos 20 personas muertas, cinco desaparecidas y localidades de 69 municipios incomunicadas es el saldo que dejó el paso del huracán «John» por Guerrero la semana pasada. La Secretaría de Gestión de Riesgos y Protección Civil de Guerrero informaron sobre 15 personas fallecidas. Doce de ellas en Acapulco, dos en Tlacoachistlahuaca, y una más en Malinaltepec. También refirió sobre otros cinco fallecidos más: dos en Zirándaro; una, en Malinaltepec; una en Iliatenco y otra más en Chilpancingo. Sin embargo, precisó que la Fiscalía General del Estado no ha realizado las diligencias debido a lo complicado de los accesos. Además, las autoridades buscan a cinco personas reportadas como desaparecidas: dos, en Acapulco; dos más en Chilpancingo, y otra en el municipio de Juan R. Escudero, detalló la dependencia local. El informe también reportó 736 viviendas colapsadas y a otras 251 más se les cayó su techo. También, indicó, durante las precipitaciones se registraron 197 derrumbes, 15 socavones y tres puentes destruidos. La Comisión de Infraestructura Carretera y Aeroportuaria de Guerrero (Cicaeg) informó que el huracán «John» afectó 143 carreteras. Mientras tanto, las clases fueron suspendidas hoy en todos los niveles de educación en la entidad ante la formación de dos zonas de baja presión en el Océano Pacífico, lo que provocará lluvias en todo el territorio estatal. Más de un millón de estudiantes de los diferentes niveles...

title: Ariana Grande Has Once Again Addressed The Scrutiny She Is Receiving For Her “New Voice”
content: In recent months, Ariana Grande has been subjected to increasing scrutiny over her voice, with fans accusing her of putting on a fake accent in real life since landing the role of Glinda in her upcoming movie, Wicked . Back in June, a clip from her appearance on Podcrushed went viral when Ariana’s voice completely changed mid-sentence , which caught many social media users off guard. At the time, she responded to the discourse in a TikTok comment , where she insisted that she has valid reasons for the way that she speaks. “habit (speaking like this for two years) and also vocal health :) 🍵 i intentionally change my vocal placement (high / low) often depending on how much singing i’m doing 😭” she wrote at the time, going on to add: “i’ve always done this BYE.” And Ari addressed the situation some more during an appearance on the Shut Up Evan podcast in July. Here, she said that changing voices is “ a normal thing that people do ” as she once again reiterated that she spent a long time speaking in character as Glinda during filming for the movie. “Another thing that is really real is that I did just spend a long time playing a character every single day and training my voice to do different things,” she said. “The voice is in the body; it’s an instrument, and muscle memory is a real thing. That’s a normal thing for people who, it’s their job to transform.” Ariana also claimed that male actors do not face the same level of scrutiny for changing themselves for a role that female...

title: 350 طنا الإنتاج المتوقع لزيت الزيتون في الطفيلة
content: قال مدير زراعة الطفيلة المهندس طارق العبيديين، اليوم الأربعاء، إن كميات زيت الزيتون المتوقعة لهذا الموسم تقدر بحوالي 350 طنا، لافتا إلى إجراء مسوحات حول الكميات المتوقعة لثمار الزيتون ضمن المساحة الزراعية المقدرة بحوالي 25 ألف دونم. اضافة اعلان وأشار إلى أن ارتفاع أو انخفاض كميات إنتاج الزيتون في الموسم تتفاوت بين محافظة وأخرى استنادا لكميات هطول الأمطار، متوقعا أن تتأثر المساحات البعلية المزروعة بالزيتون، خاصة أشجار الزيتون المعمر، جراء جفاف عيون المياه، وموجات الحر خلال فصل الصيف وتراجع معدلات الأمطار التي تؤدي إلى انخفاض منسوب عيون المياه المغذية. وأضاف أن حشرة الزيتون القطنية (البسيلا) والتي ساعد في انتشارها ارتفاع الحرارة صيفا، كان لها دور بإعاقة عمليات تلقيح الأزهار. وأعرب عدد من مالكي مزارع الزيتون عن مخاوفهم من تأثير ظاهرة التصحر وتدهور مصادر المياه في المحافظة، على الزيتون المعمر في قرى (عيمة والعين البيضاء) وغيرها. وأكدوا أن مساحات واسعة من بساتين الزيتون المعمر تتعرض لخطر الجفاف، جراء انخفاض منسوب الينابيع التي تروي البساتين واختفاء ينابيع أخرى جراء تدني معدلات الأمطار السنوية، داعين إلى صيانة الينابيع واستغلال الفاقد من مياهها الذي يذهب هدرا بين الشعاب والأودية للاستفادة منها بري الأشجار، إضافة إلى إقامة سدود مائية ومشروعات للحصاد المائي كمشروع سد الولادات، الذي أعدت دراسات تنفيذه، قبل تجميده لعدم وجود مخصصات مالية.

title: Princess Theodora's emotional wedding moment with brother Crown Prince Pavlos following father's death
creator: Nichola Murphy
content: Greece's Princess Theodora shared a special wedding moment with her brother Prince Pavlos, who walked her down the aisle at 5.30 pm on Saturday 28 September at the Metropolitan Cathedral of Athens. After the late King Constantine died in January 2023, delaying Theodora's wedding with Matthew Kumar for the second time, the bride turned to her brother for support on her big day. The siblings' emotional moment at the altar was caught on camera, with photos showing Pavlos kissing his sister's hand as he gave his blessing ahead of the ceremony. Constantine's death The British-born Greek royal, 41, got engaged to American lawyer Matthew in 2018. The couple's wedding was initially set to take place on the Greek island of Spetses in 2020 but was postponed due to the Covid-19 pandemic. They set their new date for "early 2023", but they postponed the wedding once again after the late King died on 10 January. Constantine died aged 82 after spending time in intensive care at the Hygeia Hospital in Athens. Shortly after his death, the royal-turned-actress took to her Instagram page to share a heartbreaking tribute to her father which read: "It's been two months since you left us. Miss you every day Papa. Love you [white heart emoji]." Theodora's wedding Theodora and Matthew's wedding celebrations began with a pre-wedding dinner at the Byzantine and Christian Museum, where Theodora stepped out in a midi dress featuring a statement bow on the back. The following day, she walked down the...

title: Aussie teen's harrowing plea after she was attacked by a Rottweiler that she's known since he was a puppy
content: Aussie teen's harrowing plea after she was attacked by a Rottweiler that she's known since he was a puppy Teenager warns of dogs' unpredictable nature Attacked by friend's Rottweiler without warning READ MORE: Dog attack victim shares blunt message By Freddy Pawle For Daily Mail Australia Published: 15:51 BST, 2 October 2024 | Updated: 15:58 BST, 2 October 2024 e-mail View comments A teen has issued a dire warning to Aussies after she was mauled by a Rottweiler that she had known since he was a puppy. Haylee Owens, 19, was visiting her friend's home in Noranda in Perth 's north-west on Sunday when the four-year-old dog named Ninja suddenly bit her on the face. Ms Owens' friends called an ambulance as her forehead had started profusely bleeding. The brutal attack left the teen needing plastic surgery and 28 stitches which she says could leave permanent scars. Despite being friendly with Ninja for years, Ms Owens said the dog launched at her in the blink of an eye while 'giving him cuddles'. Despite the terrifying ordeal, she has since returned to see her friend's dog without incident but admitted her parents were still 'iffy about the situation'. Ms Owens urged Aussies to always be weary of dogs, no matter the breed or how well they know them. 'You never know what's going through their minds or bodies,' she told PerthNow . Perth teenager Haylee Owens has warned Aussies to always be weary around dogs after her friend's Rottweiler, Ninja (both pictured), attacked her without...

title: Fuming Matt Fitzpatrick blasts PGA Tour golfers and hits out at 'disgrace' development
creator: Fraser Watson
content: English golfer Matt Fitzpatrick has hit out at the "disgrace" that has followed the DP World Tour's merger with the PGA. In November 2020 the two organisations entered a 'strategic alliance' that they claimed was designed to 'connect the ecosystem' of men's professional golf. Fitzpatrick is currently in Scotland ahead of the defence of his Alfred Dunhill Links Championship title this week. But it's off the course where there could be a seismic impact on the future of the sport, with PGA Tour commisioner Jay Monahan, Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund governor Yasir Al-Rumayyan, and DP World Tour chief executive Guy Kinnings set for pivotal merger talks. And the 2022 US Open champion has now strongly implied that the decision of bosses four years ago, when the DP World Tour was still known as the European Tour, contributed to future discontent. “I don’t think the Tour should have gone with the PGA Tour,” he said at St Andrews. “I was pretty livid, to be honest, at Wentworth when I found out that there was a handful of PGA Tour players coming to play the BMW PGA Championship. And at that point in time, not every person who kept their card last year got in the field, which I think is a disgrace. That’s the flagship event. “There’s no invites given to European Tour players at THE PLAYERS Championship. So why are we dishing them out for Wentworth? I thought that was absolutely absurd that that even went through.” The timing of the 30-year-old's comments is intriguing, as...

title: Investiguen l’origen d’una fuita d’hidrocarbur que afecta al riu Valira al seu pas per Andorra
creator: Albert L. Cobo (ACN)
content: Els Bombers d’Andorra, juntament amb tècnics de l’àrea de Medi Ambient del Principat, investiguen l’origen d’una fuita d’hidrocarbur que ha afectat el riu Valira a Escaldes-Engordany. El vessament ha estat detectat durant la matinada d’aquest dimecres i els efectius treballen sobre el terreny per minimitzar-ne l’impacte, tot instal·lant diversos elements per retenir la fuita. La delegada del Govern a l’Alt Pirineu i Aran, Sílvia Romero, de visita a l’Alt Urgell, ha explicat que han estat informats del succés i que els han transmès que el vessament està controlat, sense que hi hagi constància que hagi arribat a Catalunya. En aquest sentit, ha dit que es tracta d’una “situació excepcional” que els “preocupa” i de la qual cal fer un seguiment. L’alcalde de la Seu d’Urgell, Joan Barrera , ha apuntat que confia que el vessament quedi controlat i “no arribi més enllà” i ha remarcat la importància que els rius estiguin “nets”. Tot plegat ho ha dit en el marc d’una reunió amb la delegada al consistori, des d’on ha demanat “tenir una veu comuna”, mitjançant el treball conjunt dels diversos municipis i comarques del Pirineu, a l’hora de reivindicar amb més “força” les “mancances” que pateix el territori. Barrera ha citat temes com ara les dificultats d’accés a l’habitatge i la necessitat de ampliar i millorar diverses infraestructures. La delegada del Govern ha coincidit amb l’alcalde en què hi ha problemes que són compartits, però també d’altres que afecten d’una...

title: عوام اسرائیلی جارحیت کے خلاف 6اکتوبر کو الاقصیٰ ملین مارچ میں بھر پور شرکت کریں، منعم ظفر
content: منعم ظفر خان نے ٹاؤن چیئرمین لیاقت آباد فراز حسیب،وائس چیئرمین اسحاق تیموری،کے ہمراہ یونین کمیٹی نمبر07 سی ایریا میں ٹیپو سلطان پارک اور سید شہاب الدین ماڈل اسٹریٹ کا افتتاح کرتے ہوئے کہاکہ عوام کے اندر اسرائیل کے حوالے سے کوی ابہام نہیں، عوام اسرائیل کے خلاف ہیں، حکمرانوں پر عوامی دباؤ بڑھانے کی ضرورت ہے۔ انہوں نے مزید کہاکہ جماعت اسلامی کے تحت اتوار 6اکتوبر کو 3بجے دن شاہراہ فیصل پر عظیم الشان اور تاریخی ”الاقصیٰ ملین مارچ“ منعقد ہوگا، اہل کراچی اپنی فیملی کے ہمراہ جوق در جوق شریک ہوں اور پوری دنیا کو اسرائیل کے خلاف متحد ہونے کا پیغام دیں۔ امیر جماعت اسلامی کراچی کا کہنا تھا کہ بلدیاتی انتخابات میں لیاقت آباد کے لوگوں نے جماعت اسلامی پر اعتماد کا اظہار کیا،ہم لیاقت آباد ٹاؤن کے عوام کے اعتماد پر پورا اتریں گے۔ 10 مہینے میں ہمارے نوجوان ٹاؤن چیئرمین فراز حسیب اور ان کی ٹیم نے لیاقت آباد ٹاون میں مثالی ترقیاتی کام کرکے ثابت کر دیا ہے کہ ہم نے دعوے نہیں بلکہ عوام کے اعتماد و تعاون سے کام کر کے دکھایا۔

title: UP के सोनभद्र में मारपीट के बाद आदिवासी के मुंह पर किया पेशाब, वीडियो वायरल
content: ज्ञान प्रकाश चतुर्वेदी, सोनभद्र: यूपी के सोनभद्र में आदिवासी युवक के ऊपर पेशाब करने का मामला सामने आने के बाद हड़कंप मच गया गया। इसको लेकर पीड़ित के भाई की ओर से एक्स के जरिए पुलिस से शिकायत की गई है। पीड़ित पर पेशाब करने का वीडियो भी वायरल किए जाने की बात सामने आने के बाद पुलिस सक्रिय हो गई है। एएसपी कालू सिंह ने बताया कि इस मामले में आरोपी अंकित भारती को गिरफ्तार कर लिया गया है और उसके साथियों की तलाश की जा रही है। पीड़ित के भाई ने दी जानकारी स्वयं को आदिवासी बताने वाले पीड़ित के भाई शिवकुमार खरवार की तरफ से बुधवार की दोपहर एक्स पर एक युवक की पिटाई कर उसके सिर, चेहरे और मुंह पर पेशाब करने का वीडियो वायरल किया गया। साथ ही सीएम, डीजीपी समेत अन्य अधिकारियों को टैग करके कार्रवाई की मांग की गई। इसके बाद हड़कंप मच गया। पीड़ित का भाई बताते हुए शिवकुमार ने आरोपी अंकित भारती, श्रवण और सात से आठ अन्य युवकों पर आरोप लगाते हुए कार्रवाई की मांग की और सुरक्षा की गुहार लगाई। जैसे ही प्रकरण पुलिस के संज्ञान में आया वैसे ही मामले की छानबीन शुरू कर दी गई। पुलिस अधीक्षक स्तर से शक्तिनगर पुलिस को मामले में त्वरित कार्रवाई के निर्देश दिए गए। पूर्व विधायक सुरेंद्र बहादुर का रायबरेली एसपी कार्यालय पर हंगामा, देखिए किस पर लगाया पैसे लेने का आरोप एएसपी ने दी जानकारी पुलिस आरोपियों की जुट गई। मौके पर पहुंचे एएसपी कालू सिंह ने बताया कि शिकायत के आधार पर आरोपी अंकित भारती को गिरफ्तार कर लिया गया है, जबकि उसके सात आठ साथियों की तलाश चल रही है। घटना 26 सितंबर की है। पीड़ित के भाई ने बताया कि घायल हो जाने के चलते वह पीड़ित को लेकर मध्य प्रदेश के अस्पताल चले गए थे, इसलिए घटना की सूचना पुलिस को नहीं दी।...

title: Japan's new government welcomes 'forward-looking' congratulatory message from China
creator: Associated Press
content: TOKYO (AP) — Japan's new government said Wednesday it hopes to improve ties with China after receiving a “forward-looking” congratulatory message from Beijing on the election of Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba. Ties between Japan and China have been strained by a territorial dispute, Japan's wartime history, and most recently, the killing of a Japanese schoolboy in China. In a message on Tuesday congratulating Ishiba, Chinese President Xi Jinping said it was in the interests of both countries to pursue peaceful coexistence, friendship and mutually beneficial cooperation. Xi also expressed hope that Japan would work with China to meet each other halfway and build a constructive and stable relationship reflecting the requirements of the new era. “We take the congratulatory message that came on the day of the inauguration as President Xi’s forward-looking message toward Japan-China relations,” Japanese chief government spokesperson Yoshimasa Hayashi said. Hayashi said Japan and China have many issues and concerns, but Tokyo hopes to build a constructive and stable relationship through mutual effort. He said Japan also wants to promote communication with China at all levels to deepen their relationship. Separately, new Japanese Foreign Minister Takeshi Iwaya said Japan needs to balance dialogue and deterrence in dealing with China because of its increasingly assertive military actions and territorial claims. Iwaya said he hopes to meet with his counterpart, Wang Yi, as soon as...

title: Are aliens trying to contact Earth? Scientists reveal 'weird' origin of signal that traveled 8 billion years through space
content: Are aliens trying to contact Earth? Scientists reveal 'weird' origin of signal that traveled 8 billion years through space READ MORE: Scientists explore how aliens could be stuck on their 'home world' By Matthew Phelan Senior Science Reporter For Dailymail.Com Published: 10:26 EDT, 2 October 2024 | Updated: 11:11 EDT, 2 October 2024 e-mail 19 shares 3 View comments Scientists have identified the 'weird' origin of a high-energy burst of radio waves that traveled eight billion years through space before reaching Earth. More than 1,000 fast radio bursts (FRBs) — intense radio waves that typically last for a few milliseconds — have been recorded since they first caught scientists' attention 15 years ago, leaving some astronomers to speculate that a few of these FRBs could be alien life trying to contact our planet. Now, new imagery from NASA 's Hubble Space Telescope has revealed that the source of this unusually strong FRB came from a 'blob-like' cluster of galaxies eight billion light-years away: 1.83 billion times the distance from Earth to Alpha Centauri. This tightly packed set of seven galaxies could prove to have been ideal conditions for an extraterrestrial species developing interstellar space travel, or an explosive pile-up of 'big galactic traffic accidents,' as astronomer Dr Stuart Ryder put it. Either case could explain why this mysterious FRB was 3.5 times stronger than any previous astrophysics model predicted it would be from its vast distance away. New NASA...

title: Norwegia nie rozstanie się z gotówką
creator: APW, PAP
content: Władze Norwegii zmieniają podejście do tradycyjnych form płatności. Choć w kraju planowano odejście od tradycyjnego pieniądza, nowe prawo utrzymuje powszechną możliwość płatności gotówką. Od 1 października żaden norweski przedsiębiorca nie może odmówić przyjęcia od klienta płatności w gotówce, o ile należność nie przekracza 20 tys. koron (ok.7,4 tys. zł). Nowe przepisy nie obejmują płatności w gabinetach lekarskich i w środkach komunikacji publicznej. Minister sprawiedliwości i spraw wewnętrznych Emilie Enger Mehl w rozmowie ze stacją TV2 przyznała, że nie wszyscy korzystali z ucyfrowienia płatności. Według ostatnich badań nawet 600 tys. Norwegów świadomie nie korzysta z elektronicznych rozwiązań płatniczych. To ponad 10 proc. ludności kraju; większość stanowią seniorzy. „Musimy zwrócić się ku osobom, które mają trudności z korzystaniem z cyfrowych środków płatniczych. W dzisiejszym świecie łatwo zapomnieć, że istnieje duża grupa ludzi, którzy cyfrowi nie są” – podkreśliła Enger Mehl. Jak dodała, powrót do tradycyjnego pieniądza ma przygotować Norwegię na możliwą awarię systemów płatności elektronicznych – zarówno z przyczyn technicznych, jak i przez ingerencję służb specjalnych innych państw czy grup hakerskich. W takich wypadkach gotówka jest, według Enger Mehl, najbezpieczniejszym rozwiązaniem. APW, PAP

title: Shakira regresa a Argentina: cuándo y cómo conseguir las entradas
creator: zoe
content: La estrella internacional Shakira anunció una gira por Latinoamérica que la traerá nuevamente a Argentina el próximo 7 de marzo en el Campo Argentino de Polo con producción de Fenix Entertainment, marcando su tan esperado regreso al país y prometiendo una experiencia que trasciende a la música. “ Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour” visitará Argentina, Chile, Brasil, México, Colombia y Perú. Con esta gira debutará en nuevos escenarios y regresa a ciudades por las que hacía tiempo no pasaba, incluyendo su Barranquilla natal donde se presentará después de 19 años. La Preventa Santander Select Visa para su esperado concierto en Argentina estará disponible a partir del miércoles 9 de octubre a las 10 por 48 horas o hasta agotar stock. Una vez agotada la Preventa Santander Select Visa, comenzará la Preventa Santander Visa por 48 horas o hasta agotar stock. Finalizadas las preventas, comenzará la venta general con todos los medios de pago disponibles. “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour” es un homenaje a la popular música de Shakira, con una mirada hacia el futuro. Inspirada en su álbum “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran”, esta gira promueve un mensaje de empoderamiento y fortaleza , que Shakira busca transmitir a varias generaciones de fans, quienes nunca la han visto en vivo o a esos que llevan varios años esperando su regreso. Con una nueva producción diseñada con la más alta tecnología, sus mayores éxitos, canciones nuevas y varias sorpresas, el concierto...

title: خداحافظی از تورم با احداث باغ گردو ژنوتیپ ارغوان
content: : شاید از خودتان بپرسید آیا واقعا چنین چیزی ممکن هست؟! در جواب برای شما پاسخ الکی نمیدم کافیه یک سر انگشتی محاسبه جزئی بکنید. اگر در یک هکتار باغ گردو من بتوانم 10 تن گردو برداشت کنم و این میزان گردو را حتی به ارزانترین قیمت بازار بفروشم چقد ممکنه سود کنم؟ بله سود بی حساب کتابی دارد ولی واقعا به این سادگی هست؟ ایندفعه جواب مثبت نیست چون چند چالش روبه روی شماست، چالش 1 چه نهالی بکارم تا رشدش به این حد برسه چالش های بعدی چگونه رسیدگی کنم، چگونه هرس کنم، روش های آبیاری چگونه هست، از چه کودی استفاده کنم و چندین سوال دیگر که ما دراین مقاله جواب خواهیم داد. شما قبل از اینکه به مقوله پیدا کردن رقم مناسب باشید باید به فکر نهالستان معتبر باشید. بله منظور نهالستانی هست که بتواند چنین نهالی تولید کند، شکرخدا کشور ایران پر از مناطقی هست که دارای خاک طلایی درجه یک هست همراه با آب و هوای بسیار عالی برای رشد نهال گردو می باشد. کافیست نهالستان را پیدا کنید، نهالستان ارغوان نهال معروف به پدر گردوی ایران با تولید نهال گردو ژنوتیپ ارغوان تیپ 9 یکی از تولید کنندگان نهال گردو در جهان شناخته شده هست امروزه نهال های تولیدی ارغوان نهال به کشورهای منطقه از جمله ترکیه ، عراق ، آذربایجان ، افغانستان ، پاکستان وغیره ارسال می شود علاوه بر این کشورهای اروپایی نیز استقبال بالایی از گردو ژنوتیپ ارغوان تیپ 9 کرده اند. چرا که این گردو بصورت اصلاح شده در نهالستان تولید شده و بازدهی آن نیز به خوبی به همه شناخته شده هست این نهال قابلیت ها و ویژگی هایی دارد که آن را از بقیه نهال های گردو متمایز کرده هست در ادامه به برخی از آنها می پردازیم. دارای ویژگی‌های برجسته‌ای است که آن را به یکی از بهترین گزینه‌ها...

title: Le duo qui va remplacer Aliou Cissé pour les prochains matchs dévoilé (photos)
creator: Modou Mamoune Tine
content: La Fédération Sénégalaise de Football (FSF) a confirmé que le contrat d’Aliou Cissé, entraîneur emblématique des Lions de la Teranga, ne sera pas renouvelé. Vient désormais le temps de sa succession. La décision de ne pas renouveler le bail d’Aliou Cissé marque la fin de près d’une décennie de collaboration couronnée de succès, notamment avec la victoire historique du Sénégal lors de la CAN 2021 et une deuxième qualification consécutive pour le Mondial. → A LIRE AUSSI : Equipe nationale : La première réaction du gouvernement après le limogeage de Aliou Cissé Cependant, les performances récentes, notamment l’élimination prématurée en huitièmes de finale à la CAN 2023 et le Mondial 2022, ont conduit à cette décision. Le ministère des Sports a opté pour un changement à la tête de l’équipe, motivé par des critiques croissantes sur les choix tactiques et les résultats mitigés. Serigne Saliou Dia et Pape Thiaw sont pressentis pour prendre temporairement les rênes de la sélection sénégalaise lors des prochains matchs contre le Malawi, dans le cadre des éliminatoires de la CAN 2025​. → A LIRE AUSSI : Aliou Cissé limogé à quelques jours du match, voici comment la liste des « Lions » sera publiée → A LIRE AUSSI : Sénégal : Aliou Cissé évincé, un sérieux prétendant à sa succession se démarque

title: हरियाणा में केजरीवाल को दूसरा झटका, अब नीलोखेड़ी के प्रत्याशी ने छोड़ा मैदान, कांग्रेस को समर्थन का ऐलान
content: चंडीगढ़: हरियाणा विधानसभा चुनाव के लिए वोटिंग में अब सिर्फ दो दिन बाकी रह गए हैं। इससे पहले राज्य की 90 सीटों पर लड़ रही आम आदमी पार्टी को बड़ा झटका लगा है। फरीदाबाद के बाद अब करनाल के नीलोखेड़ी सीट पर आप कैंडिडेट ने मैदान छोड़ दिया है। बुधवार को आम आदमी पार्टी के करनाल की नीलोखेड़ी सीट से उम्मीदवार अमर सिंह ने पार्टी छोड़ दी। इसके बाद वह कांग्रेस पार्टी में शामिल हो गए। हरियाणा में गुरुवार यानी तीन अक्तूबर को चुनाव प्रचार खत्म होगा और पांच अक्तूबर को वोट डाले जाएंगे। क्यों छोड़ दिया मैदान? आम आदमी पार्टी (आप) ने करनाल की नीलोखेड़ी सीट अमर सिंह को अपना उम्मीदवार बनाया था। आप प्रत्याशी ने अमर सिंह कांग्रेस की तरफ से नियुक्त किए विशेष प्रभारी प्रताप सिंह बाजवा की मौजूदगी में सदस्यता ली। प्रदेश में वोटिंग होने से पहले ही आप कैंडिडेट के मैदान से हटने से पार्टी को झटका लगा है। अमर सिंह के कांग्रेस में शामिल होने के मौके पर बाजवा ने उनका स्वागत किया और कहा कि सिख समुदाय के अधिकांश लोगों ने अमर सिंह अपील की थी कि वे उन्हें वोट देना चाहते हैं, लेकिन अभी वे बीजेपी को किसान विरोधी, दलित विरोधी, पिछड़ा वर्ग विरोधी और जवान विरोधी होने का सबक सिखाना चाहते हैं। इसके बाद उन्होंने आप में शामिल होने का फैसला लिया। बीजेपी-कांग्रेस में है मुकाबला करनाल जिले में आने वाली इस सीट पर बीजेपी और कांग्रेस के बीच मुकाबला है। कांग्रेस ने पिछली बार निर्दलीय जीते धर्म पाल गोंदर को टिकट दिया है तो वहीं बीजेपी ने भगवान दास कबीरपंथी को मैदान में उतारा है। पिछली बार गोंदर ने यह सीट निर्दलीय कैंडिडेट के तौर पर जीती थी। उन्होंने तब कबीरपंथी को 2222 वोटों से शिकस्त दी थी।

title: Перед боем он читал «Вечерку»
creator: news@vm.ru (Наталья Науменко)
content: И через восемьдесят с лишним лет под Ржевом, где проходило одно из самых кровопролитных сражений Великой Отечественной войны, поисковики находят останки погибших здесь советских солдат. Недавно участники экспедиции, организованной столичным поисковым движением «Пионер», Николай Зубов и Рустам Гараев, обнаружили рядом с останками солдата частично сохранившийся номер «Вечерней Москвы» за 5 сентября 1942 года. Нам удалось связаться и поговорить с поисковиком Николаем Зубовым. Родом он из Ржева, проживает в Тверской области. Его родных, как и большинство других советских семей, Великая Отечественная война не обошла стороной. Родители маленькими пережили немецкую оккупацию. В боях под Смоленском пропал без вести его дядя Павел Дмитриевич Зубов. — Я до пенсии проработал машинистом экскаватора, строил дороги в Ржевском районе. Земля здесь до сих пор хранит много свидетельств тех страшных боев, которые длились с 1941-го по 1943 год. Бывало, во время работы то мину военного времени, то бомбу авиационную неразорвавшуюся выковыряешь, — рассказывает Николай. За работой поисковиков он неоднократно наблюдал со стороны, а как только вышел на заслуженный отдых, попросился к ним в помощники. Рустам Гараев из Набережных Челнов часто выезжал на вахты памяти со своими земляками, а прошлой весной оказался в рядах «Пионера» — решил попроситься к москвичам «на стажировку». Ведь за «Пионером» закрепилась слава одного из самых удачливых поисковых отрядов. — Главной нашей задачей...

title: JT de 20h de TF1 : le nom du joker de Gilles Bouleau dévoilé, on sait qui le remplacera pendant ses vacances
content: Par Maxime T'sjoen Publié le 2 oct. 2024 à 16h51 Voir mon actu Suivre Actu Ancienne figure de BFMTV, mais aussi des soirées Ligue des champions sur RMC , Jean-Baptiste Boursier prend du galon dans le groupe TF1. Le présentateur de la matinale de LCI devient le joker de Gilles Bouleau au journal de 20h, a indiqué la chaîne sur X , mercredi 2 octobre 2024. Il remplace Julien Arnaud , qui avait quitté la Une pour la Deux et sa matinale Télématin. À lire aussi TF1, M6, France 2... Qui reste, qui part ? Les nouvelles têtes que vous verrez à la rentrée à la télé Un 20h en pleine bourre Concrètement, Jean-Baptiste Boursier remplacera Gilles Bouleau quand ce dernier sera en congés . Celui qui prendra les rênes de son premier JT le 21 octobre prochain , selon les informations du Parisien , arrive dans un 20h qui attire les téléspectateurs. En moyenne, en septembre, 5,3 millions de personnes (soit 28,1 % de part d’audience) regardait le journal d’informations. Jean-Baptiste Boursier est le nouveau joker de Gilles Boulleau. (©JOEL SAGET / AFP) Vidéos : en ce moment sur Actu C’est 1,5 million de plus que son principal concurrent, France 2. title: How massive billboards made ‘Britain’s worst station’ even more hated
creator: The Telegraph
content: Passengers at London Euston have had to endure years of overcrowding, delays and cancellations played out in the garishly lit concrete box that passes for a railway station. But even hardened veterans of the “Euston stampede”, as the mad dash for platforms that follows the last-minute announcement of departures is known, were stunned by the replacement of its main information board with a vast advertising screen. The decision to swap the board, one of the most detailed on the UK rail network, with the 200ft screen – a move ostensibly aimed at reducing congestion while netting manager Network Rail millions of pounds – marked . Their anger boiled over last week as torrential rain and a death on the track led to mass cancellations of Avanti West Coast trains, Britain’s worst-performing train operator, and left Euston perilously overcrowded as thousands of people crammed on to the concourse. Passengers bound for Birmingham, Manchester, Liverpool, Glasgow, Edinburgh and dozens of locations in between peered at the four smaller screens that replaced the old board, desperately seeking out information on their disrupted journeys. Above them loomed the 2,500 sq ft advertising display, still looping between ads for Canadian holidays, ITVX and the new Transformers film as the country’s busiest intercity station descended into chaos. On social Network Rail’s misplaced priorities. One took to X, formerly known as Twitter, to ask: “Why is the massive screen just for adverts?? I just want...

title: Much more can be done for women’s football, says Carney, as she is made an OBE
creator: PA Media: UK News
content: Former England international Karen Carney said “so much more” can be done for women’s football, as she was made an OBE at Windsor Castle on Wednesday. Carney, who played for Birmingham City as well as the Lionesses, was honoured for her services to association football. She was previously commissioned by the Government to conduct a major review on the future of the domestic women’s game. The review recommended wide-ranging reform at the elite and grassroots level of domestic football, to fully capitalise on the Lionesses’ Euros success. Speaking after being honoured by the Prince of Wales, she said “the sky is the limit” for women’s football. “Part of me receiving my OBE was because of the review I conducted into women’s football, and I think we’ve still got a lot more to do from grassroots talent pathway all the way to the elite level,” she said. “But if you look at the stats, if you look at the data, the game is absolutely thriving. “Imagine what it could be if we gave it more, and that’s why I, and so many of us, have to champion it on a day-to-day basis, to keep demanding more for the sport. “Then the sky’s the limit.” Carney said she had “some banter” with William, whose team, Aston Villa, plays hers later on Wednesday. “To be brutally honest, a lot of people know I’m a Birmingham City fan, there’s a big game at Aston Villa tonight,” she said. “Obviously with Prince William being a Villa fan I thought there was a good opportunity for some banter with him. “He was really...

title: Anderlecht mist Leander Dendoncker voor Europa League-wedstrijd tegen Real Sociedad
Panthers designate Ian Thomas, Dane Jackson for return from IR
content: Panthers head coach Dave Canales said that the team was set to get two players back on the practice field this week and the team officially opened the door for their return on Wednesday. Cornerback Dane Jackson and tight end Ian Thomas have both been designated for return from injured reserve. Both players went on the list before the season opener, so they’ve missed four games and can be activated at any point. Jackson, who signed with the Panthers this offseason, injured his hamstring in mid-August and Thomas is dealing with a calf injury. Thomas has 116 catches for 1,055 yards and four touchdowns in 94 games with Carolina. Both players will have a three-week window to practice with the team before they’ll reach a deadline to activate them or shut them down for the rest of the season.

title: Netwerk24 | Alcaraz veg terug, klop Sinner in Chinese Ope
Günstiger Urlaub: In diesen Ländern ist der Euro 2024 stark
creator: Fritz Edelhoff
content: Schnäppchen: Wo du mit dem Euro günstig Urlaub machst Touristen besuchen einen Basar in der malerischen Stadt Buchara in Usbekistan. Eines der Reiseziele, die sich für Urlauberinnen und Urlauber aus dem Euro-Raum 2024 besonders lohnen. Quelle: IMAGO/SNA Bei der Suche für den nächsten Urlaub lohnt es sich immer, auch einen Blick auf den Wechselkurs der jeweiligen Währung zum Euro zu werfen. An diesen Orten können Reisende noch in diesem Jahr besonders sparen. Wer häufig in Europa Urlaub macht, wird die Erleichterungen, die der Euro beim Bezahlen in anderen EU-Ländern gebracht hat, durchaus zu schätzen wissen. Dass vor dem Urlaub in vielen beliebten Urlaubsländern nicht mehr aufwendig Geld gewechselt werden muss, ist jedoch nicht der einzige Vorteil, den die gemeinsame Währung bringt. Der Euro ist zusammen mit dem US-Dollar eine der stabilsten Währungen der Welt – und das trotz der etlichen Krisen in den letzten Jahren. Viele andere Länder auf der Welt haben deutlich mehr mit Inflation beziehungsweise Währungsverfall zu kämpfen. Für die Menschen vor Ort ist das natürlich ein großes Problem, für Schnäppchenjägerinnen und ‐jäger aus dem Euro-Raum bietet sich jedoch . In welchen beliebten Urlaubsländern Reisende im Jahr 2024 für ihre Euros einen bekommen, hat der Anbieter für Multi-Währungs-Konten „ ermittelt (Stand: 2. Oktober 2024).
