title: La capitaine de l'OGC Nice Handball, Marine Dupuis, convoquée chez les Bleues
content: Sélectionnée par le nouveau coach des Bleues, Sébastien Gardillou (qui a coaché le Gym de 2012 à 2016), l'ailière gauche arrivée de Nantes cet été aura l'occasion de montrer son potentiel face à la Hongrie lors des deux prochains matchs amicaux, les 20 et 26 octobre. Une belle reconnaissance pour la joueuse niçoise, déjà réserviste mais non-appelée pour les JO, dont les performances en club n'ont pas échappé au staff tricolore.

title: Prieš išsikraustymą princas Harry tėvui pasakė 7 žodžius: štai kokie jie buvo
content: Klausimas karalių labai supykdė. Dauguma ne karališkųjų šeimų negali leisti sau tokios prabangos, kad jų suaugę vaikai liktų gyventi kartu tėvų namuose. Tačiau kai santykiai tarp tėvų ir vaikų nutrūksta, daugeliui pravers 10 patarimų, kaip užmegzti santykius su atitolusiais seneliais. Princo knygoje rašoma, kad kai buvo priverstas išsikraustyti iš Frogmoro kotedžo, sutrikęs princas Harry savo tėvo paklausė, argi jis daugiau nenori matyti savo anūkų. Frogmoro kotedžas princui Harry ir Meghan kelia ypatingus prisiminimus. TAIP PAT SKAITYKITE: Pora gyveno šioje valdoje prieš susituokiant. Princas Harry pasipiršo Meghan Markle tuo metu, kai abu gamino vakarienę savo namuose Nottingham kotedže, o į Frogmorą jie persikraustė 2019 m. balandį, prieš gimstant jų pirmajam vaikui Archie. Pasak interneto svetainės „Page Six“, ne viskas buvo šilta ir draugiška, kai jam buvo liepta išsikraustyti iš Frogmoro kotedžo, namo, kurį jiems padovanojo velionė karalienė Elžbieta po jų vestuvių 2018 m. Teigiama, kad princui Harry ir Meghan buvo liepta grąžinti šį nekilnojamą turtą, nes jie nebebuvo dirbantys karališkosios šeimos nariai, kai 2020 m. pasitraukė iš vyresniųjų karališkųjų pareigų. Karališkosios knygos autorius teigia, kad šis namas buvo „vienintelė tikrai saugi galimybė šeimai lankytis Jungtinėje Karalystėje“, nes teritoriją saugo ginkluoti sargybiniai.

title: Presiona EU en maíz; reafirma CSP postura
creator: Agencia Reforma
content: CIUDAD DE MÉXICO.- Horas antes de que Claudia Sheinbaum tomara protesta como Presidenta de México, congresistas de Estados Unidos demandaron a su Gobierno dar prioridad a la discusión que se tiene con el País sobre maíz transgénico. En una carta enviada ayer, los legisladores estadounidenses llamaron a Tom Vilsack y a Katherine Kai, Secretario de Agricultura y titular de la Representación Comercial de EU, a que ante el cambio de Poder en México se priorice la discusión sobre el decreto mexicano que limita la importación de maíz transgénico, especialmente para consumo humano. «Instamos a seguir colaborando con sus homólogos mexicanos para abordar las barreras comerciales actuales, incluida la prohibición de México sobre el maíz transgénico. «Además, solicitamos una sesión informativa de la Oficina de la Representante Comercial de Estados Unidos (USTR) sobre el estado de la consulta sobre la disputa del maíz transgénico con el Gobierno mexicano», indicaron los congresistas en una carta enviada ayer poco antes del discurso de Sheinbaum. La respuesta de México no se hizo esperar. En su primer discurso como Presidenta de México, Sheinbaum dejó en claro que no avalará la siembra de granos transgénicos en tierras mexicanas. «Avanzaremos en la autosuficiencia alimentaria. No permitiremos la siembra de maíz transgénico. «Seremos autosuficientes en maíz blanco», reiteró la Mandataria ante el Congreso mexicano. Los legisladores estadounidenses aseguraron...

title: বন্যাপরবর্তী নদীভাঙন
content: মানব সভ্যতার ক্রমবিকাশের সঙ্গে নদ-নদীর সম্পর্ক সুপ্রাচীন ও গভীর। নদীকে কেন্দ্র করেই গড়ে উঠেছে পৃথিবীর সবচেয়ে পুরনো ও বৃহৎ সভ্যতাগুলো। বাংলাদেশের বুক চিরেও ছোট বড় অনেক নদ-নদী বয়ে গেছে, যেগুলো এক সময় ছিল যোগাযোগের অন্যতম মাধ্যম। ভূগর্ভস্থ পানির মাত্রা সমুচ্চ রাখাসহ কৃষিকাজের সেচের প্রধান উৎস হিসেবেও কাজ করে আসছে নদীগুলো। সাধারণত বর্ষাকালে নদীর প্রবাহের বিস্তৃতি অনেক বেশি থাকে। বর্ষা শেষে স্রোত ও পরিধি অনেক কমে যায়। এতে নদ-নদীর দুকূলে সৃষ্টি হয় ভাঙন। বন্যার কারণেও নদীভাঙন দেখা দেয়। সম্প্রতি দেশে কয়েক দফা বন্যা হয়েছে। ফলে, বিভিন্ন এলাকায় বিশেষ করে উত্তরাঞ্চলের রংপুর, লালমনিরহাট, কুড়িগ্রাম, নীলফামারী, গাইবান্ধা, সিরাজগঞ্জ ও টাঙ্গাইলে ইতোমধ্যে পরিস্থিতির উন্নতির সঙ্গে সঙ্গে ফুটে উঠছে বন্যার ক্ষত। এসব অঞ্চলের নদীপাড়ের মানুষ এখন রয়েছেন নদীভাঙন আতঙ্কের মধ্যে। বেসরকারি এক গবেষণা সংস্থার জরিপে দেখা গেছে, প্রতিবছর প্রাকৃতিক দুর্যোগের প্রত্যক্ষ ও পরোক্ষ শিকার হচ্ছে প্রায় ১০ লাখ মানুষ। তাদের আবার বেশিরভাগই পরিবার-পরিজন থেকে বিচ্ছিন্ন হয়ে আশ্রয়হীন হয়ে শহর অভিমুখে ছোটেন। সত্তর ও আশির দশক থেকে দেশে নদীভাঙনের তীব্রতা যেমন বেড়েছে, তেমনি বেড়েছে ক্ষয়ক্ষতি। প্রতিবছর দেশে গড়ে আট হাজারের বেশি হেক্টর জমি নদীতে বিলীন হয়ে থাকে, যার বেশির ভাগ কৃষিজমি। ক্ষতিগ্রস্তদের অধিকাংশই টাকার অভাবে ঘরবাড়ি তৈরি করতে না পারায় তাদের গৃহহীন, ছিন্নমূল জীবনযাপন করতে হয়। নদীভাঙনের প্রভাব সুদূরপ্রসারী। এর ফলে, বেশির ভাগ ক্ষতিগ্রস্ত অভাবের তাড়নায় হাতে থাকা অবশিষ্ট জমি, গবাদিপশু এবং মূল্যবান সামগ্রী বিক্রি করতে বাধ্য হয়। কাজেই নদীভাঙন রোধে কার্যকর পদক্ষেপ গ্রহণ করে বসতভিটাসহ আবাদি ও...

title: Un superviviente de la masacre de Hamás en el festival de música abatió a uno de los atacantes de Tel Aviv
creator: NTM / EP
content: Lev Kreitman , superviviente de la masacre perpetrada por el Movimiento de Resistencia Islámica ( Hamás ) en el festival de música Nova en los ataques del 7 de octubre, logró abatir el martes a uno de los autores del atentado en una estación de tranvía del barrio de Jaffa, en Tel Aviv , en el que fallecieron siete personas. Así lo ha confirmado el ministro de Seguridad Nacional de Israel, el ultranacionalista Itamar Ben Gvir , quien ha destacado que Kreitman portaba un arma propia, razón por la que ha salido al paso para ensalzar la reforma legislativa que él mismo impulsó para flexibilizar el acceso a armamento. Al menos seis muertos y nueve heridos en un ataque terrorista en Tel Aviv "Lev Kreitman, un héroe israelí que ayer neutralizó al terrorista en el terrible atentado de Jaffa. Lev también es un superviviente del Festival Nova, donde actuó con valentía bajo el infierno y salvó a muchos víctimas ", ha asegurado Ben Gvir en una publicación en su perfil oficial de la red social X. לב קרייטמן, גיבור ישראל שנטרל את המחבל אתמול בפיגוע הנורא ביפו. לב הוא גם שורד פסטיבל הנובה, שם פעל בגבורה תחת התופת וחילץ מבלים רבים. לפני חצי שנה הוא הגיש בקשה לרישיון נשק פרטי בעקבות הרפורמה שהובלנו שבה למעלה מ-120,000 איש התחמשו השנה בנשק אישי. לכו להתחמש, זה מציל חיים. pic.twitter.com/KGmNFGd282 "Hace medio año, presentó una solicitud para una licencia de armas privada tras la reforma que impulsamos y en la que más de 120.000 personas se armaron con armas personales....

Lev también es un superviviente del Festival Nova, donde actuó con valentía bajo el infierno y salvó a muchos víctimas ", ha asegurado Ben Gvir en una publicación en su perfil oficial de la red social X. לב קרייטמן, גיבור ישראל שנטרל את המחבל אתמול בפיגוע הנורא ביפו. לב הוא גם שורד פסטיבל הנובה, שם פעל בגבורה תחת התופת וחילץ מבלים רבים. לפני חצי שנה הוא הגיש בקשה לרישיון נשק פרטי בעקבות הרפורמה שהובלנו שבה למעלה מ-120,000 איש התחמשו השנה בנשק אישי. לכו להתחמש, זה מציל חיים. pic.twitter.com/KGmNFGd282 "Hace medio año, presentó una solicitud para una licencia de armas privada tras la reforma que impulsamos y en la que más de 120.000 personas se armaron con armas personales....

title: Раскрыта причина крупнейшего извержения
creator: Александр Еникеев
content: Группа сейсмологов из Австралийского национального университета (ANU), возглавляемая студентами, раскрыла ключевую причину одного из крупнейших подводных вулканических извержений — Хунга-Тонга. Исследование, опубликованное в журнале Geophysical Research Letters, проливает свет на причину катастрофического события, произошедшего два года назад. Основной причиной взрыва, как выяснили ученые, послужило сжатие горных пород, находящихся под водой. Это открытие стало неожиданным, так как ранее считалось, что такие извержения происходят из-за взаимодействия магмы с морской водой. Однако результаты исследования показывают, что именно сжатие газа в горной породе, напоминающее перегретую скороварку, вызвало мощный взрыв. Были проанализированы сейсмические данные, зафиксированные во время извержения, с помощью методики, разработанной ранее для изучения подземных ядерных взрывов. Выяснилось, что энергия взрыва была сопоставима с пятью крупнейшими подземными ядерными испытаниями, проведенными в Северной Корее в 2017 году. Мощный взрыв вызвал вертикальный выброс воды в атмосферу, что привело к возникновению цунами с волнами высотой до 45 метров. Исследователи оценили, что объем воды, выброшенной во время события, мог бы заполнить около миллиона олимпийских бассейнов. Эти колоссальные объемы воды и стали причиной разрушительных волн. Используя сейсмическое моделирование, ученые обнаружили значительную вертикальную силу, направленную вверх. Это наблюдение вначале...

title: シュチェンスニがバルセロナで現役復帰 元ポーランド代表GK - サンスポ
El municipio busca licitar la Unidad Turística Playa Dorada
creator: Ramiro Melucci
content: El Gobierno municipal elevó al Concejo Deliberante un proyecto de ordenanza para autorizar al Ente Municipal de Turismo y Cultura (Emturyc) a llamar a licitación pública para otorgar en concesión el uso y explotación de la Unidad Turística Fiscal Playa Dorada, ubicada en el sector costero sur del partido. La iniciativa busca encomendarle al ente la redacción del pliego de bases y condiciones que regule dicho proceso. En el mensaje de elevación, el municipio especificó que, a través del Emturic, se propone el desarrollo del sector mediante una licitación pública “que contribuya a la recuperación del predio, a generar nuevas oportunidades de empleo, modernizar los servicios que el sector brinda a la comunidad y a sus visitantes, la diversificación de la oferta turística y el fomento de actividades durante todo el año, lo que contribuiría sin duda al posicionamiento de la zona sur de la ciudad”. En ese marco, indicó que, “dado el notable crecimiento de la zona donde se encuentra la UTF Playa Dorada, sus características físicas particulares permiten el desarrollo de proyectos de carácter innovador que completen la oferta turística tradicional del sector sur”. La tarea a llevar a cabo “requiere la elaboración de un marco normativo que contemple tal propósito, con la apertura y amplitud necesaria para que los interesados puedan impulsar sus proyectos y presentar sus propuestas de puesta en valor sobre este espacio que hoy luce desactivado, pese a...

title: Nashipur Railway Bridge: নশিপুর রেলব্রিজে ট্রেন চলাচল শুরু, কী সুবিধা মিলবে রাজ্যের যাত্রীদের?
content: বহুদিনের প্রতীক্ষার অবসান। গান্ধী জয়ন্তীর দিন থেকেই নশিপুর রেলব্রিজ দিয়ে শুরু হলো ট্রেন চলাচল। দীর্ঘ কুড়ি বছর পর আজ থেকে শুরু হল যাত্রীবাহী ট্রেন চলাচল। এই রেল ব্রিজ চালু হওয়ার ফলে কী সুবিধা পেতে চলেছেন যাত্রীরা? মুর্শিদাবাদের জেলার লালবাগ শহরের কাছে নশিপুর এলাকাতে রয়েছে এই ব্রিজ। শিয়ালদা- লালগোলা শাখাকে আজিমগঞ্জ শাখার সঙ্গে যুক্ত করেছে নশিপুর। এই ব্রিজের উপর দিয়ে যাত্রীবাহী ট্রেন চলাচল শুরু হলে কলকাতা থেকে উত্তরবঙ্গ যাওয়ার সময় অনেকটাই কমে যাবে। শিয়ালদা থেকে উত্তরবঙ্গে যেতে এখন যা সময় লাগে, তার থেকে প্রায় তিন ঘণ্টা কম সময়েই কলকাতা থেকে উত্তরবঙ্গে পৌঁছনো যাবে। শুধু তাই নয়, উত্তর ভারতের (দিল্লির মতো) সঙ্গে রেল যোগাযোগ আরও উন্নত হয়ে উঠবে। মুর্শিদাবাদের মানুষ সহজেই দিল্লি-সহ উত্তর ভারতের বিভিন্ন জায়গায় পৌঁছতে পারবেন। তাঁদেরকে ঘুর পথে যেতে হবে না। এমনকী, নশিপুর সেতুর হাত ধরে মুর্শিদাবাদের আর্থিক উন্নতির পথ প্রশস্ত হবে। রেল যোগাযোগ ব্যবস্থা, পণ্য পরিবহণ এবং অর্থনৈতিক ও শিল্পের উন্নতির ক্ষেত্রে এই লাইন গুরুত্বপূর্ণ ভূমিকা পালন করবে। কেন বারবার দুর্ঘটনা রাঙাপানিতে? কারণ খুঁজতে পদক্ষেপ রেলের ২০০৪ সালের ডিসেম্বর মাসে নশিপুর রেল ব্রিজের শিলান্যাস করেছিলেন তৎকালীন রেলমন্ত্রী লালু প্রসাদ যাদব। এরপর ২০০৫ সালে মুর্শিদাবাদ থেকে শিয়ালদা সেকশনে সরাসরি যোগাযোগের জন্য রেল ব্রিজ তৈরির কাজ শুরু হয়েছিল। ২০১০ সালে এই রেল ব্রিজ তৈরির কাজ শেষ হয়। প্রথম পর্যায়ে আজিমগঞ্জ কৃষ্ণনগর দুটি প্যাসেঞ্জার ট্রেন চলাচল করবে নশিপুর ব্রিজের উপর দিয়ে। পরবর্তীকালে এক্সপ্রেস ট্রেনও চলবে বলে রেল সূত্রে খবর। এতদিন নদিয়া এবং মুর্শিদাবাদের মানুষকে উত্তরবঙ্গে যেতে হলে হাওড়া কিংবা...

title: North Circular shut after man killed as van and lorry crash in Chingford
creator: Evening Standard
content: A driver has died following a serious crash on the , closing the route for hours. were called at around 4.50am on Wednesday to reports of a involving two vehicles on the eastbound carriageway of the A406 in Chingford. Officers and attended but despite the efforts of emergency services a man, who was the driver of one of the vehicles, died at the scene. His next of kin have been informed. The Met Police said there were no reports of any other serious injuries and road closures remain in place. There has been no arrest and police enquiries into the circumstances continue. The North Circular was forced to close for several hours and one lane still remained shortly after 3pm. A London Ambulance Service spokesperson said: “We were called at 4.50am this morning (Wednesday 2 October) to reports of a in Southend Road, Chingford. “We sent resources to the scene, including an ambulance crew, an incident response officer and London’s Air Ambulance. “Our crews treated a man at the scene. Sadly, despite the best efforts of emergency services, he died at the scene.” A spokesperson for the London Fire Brigade added: “Firefighters were called to reports of a road traffic collision on Southend Road in Chingford. “Two vans collided with a lorry. “Control Officers received the call at 0508 and mobilised firefighters from Chingford Fire Station to the scene. The incident was over for crews at 0534.” The crash happened in Park Road, Kidbrooke, at the junction with Pegler Square, around 8.30am on...

title: Coperni’s Spray-On Dress Was a Viral Smash. This Gravity-Defying Gel Bag Might Top It
creator: Amy Francombe
content: Arthur C. Clarke famously said, “Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.” Of course, from the very beginning, Disney has been synonymous with magic, creating worlds where dreams come to life and the impossible seems attainable. But it’s the synergy between imagination and technology that’s been at the heart of Disney’s magic. Walt Disney himself assembled a team of visionaries called “ Imagineers ”—a fusion of engineers and dreamers tasked with bringing fantastical worlds to life. This blend of creativity and cutting-edge tech was on full display in last night’s collaboration between ready-to-wear fashion brand Coperni and Disney for the first-ever fashion show held at Disneyland Paris. Coperni , the self-described “techno-chic” label founded by Sébastien Meyer and Arnaud Vaillant, has consistently stood at the intersection of fashion and technology. So it’s little surprise the legacy media company tapped the duo for the honor. “We met with Disney about two years ago. The most exciting part for us was to bring more innovation to this world,” says Vaillant in the Coperni studio the day before the big spectacle. “The most important thing for Mr Walt Disney was imagination and making the impossible possible through technology—which is what Coperni is all about ,” he adds. This content can also be viewed on the site it originates from. One of the most visually striking examples of this collaboration was the creation of Coperni's iconic Swipe Bag...

title: Lord Alli under investigation for ‘alleged non-registration of interests’
creator: PA Media: UK News
content: The Labour peer at the centre of a row over donations to Sir Keir Starmer is under investigation by the Lords’ standards watchdog over an alleged failure to register interests. Lord Waheed Alli is facing a probe over potential breaches of parliamentary rules surrounding openness and accountability in the members’ code of conduct. It comes after a backlash over Sir Keir and other Cabinet members – who vowed to “clean up” British politics – accepting tens of thousands of pounds worth of gifts and freebies, many from the long-standing Labour donor. The Prime Minister has since committed to overhauling hospitality rules for ministers to ensure better transparency about what is provided. Lord Alli, a media tycoon known known in political circles for years, was brought to wider public attention in recent weeks due to scrutiny of his donations to the Prime Minister. These included £20,000 declared by Sir Keir for accommodation during the election campaign, which the PM said was to allow his son to study for his GCSEs in peace at the former TV executive’s central London flat while the family home was surrounded by media. The Prime Minister also accepted donations for glasses and clothing for both himself and his wife Lady Victoria Starmer. Sir Keir has argued Lord Alli was motivated to help financially because he wanted Labour to win the election. The controversy overshadowed the party’s first annual conference since entering Government and was cited by Canterbury MP Rosie Duffield...

title: Xarici işlər nazirinin müavini Elnur Məmmədov Meksikaya səfər edib
content: Azərbaycan Respublikası xarici işlər nazirinin müavini Elnur Məmmədov Meksikanın yeni seçilmiş Prezidenti Klaudiya Şeynbaum Pardonun andiçmə mərasimində iştirak etmək məqsədilə bu ölkəyə səfər edib. XİN-dən -ya verilən xəbərə görə, paytaxt Mexiko şəhərində, ölkənin parlament binasında keçirilmiş mərasimin ardınca tədbirdə iştirak edən xüsusi qonaqlarla Prezident Klaudiya Şeynbaum arasında keçirilən görüş zamanı nazir müavini E.Məmmədov iki ölkə arasında müxtəlif sahələrdə yüksələn xətlə inkişaf edən dostluq və əməkdaşlıq münasibətlərinin bundan sonra da inkişaf edəcəyinə inamını ifadə edib. Həmçinin ölkə rəhbərliyi adından bu ilin noyabr ayında Bakı şəhərində keçiriləcək BMT-nin İqlim Dəyişmələri üzrə Çərçivə Konvensiyasının Tərəflər Konfransının 29-cu sessiyasına dəvəti xüsusi olaraq çatdırıb. Prezident K.Şeynbaum Azərbaycan hökumətinin bu mərasimdə təmsil olunduğuna görə nazir müavininə təşəkkür edib, həmçinin Meksika ilə Azərbaycan arasında mövcud olan əməkdaşlıq əlaqələrinin daha da gücləndirilməsində maraqlı olduğunu bildirib. Mərasimdə iştirak edən Meksikanın yeni Xarici Əlaqələr naziri Xuan Ramon de la Fuente ilə nazir müavini arasında söhbət zamanı iki ölkə arasında müxtəlif sahələrdə əməkdaşlıq perspektivlərinə toxunulub. Səfər çərçivəsində nazir müavini həmçinin Meksika Senatının hazırkı sədri Xerardo Fernandes Noronya ilə, daha sonra isə Meksika Deputatlar Palatasının sədri vəzifəsini icra edən Serxio...

Три маленькие косатки, попавшие на мель на Камчатке, смогли вернуться в море
creator: (Изабелла Алимова)
content: Три маленькие косатки, застрявшие в водной ловушке на Камчатке, смогли вернуться в море. Об этом сообщила глава Росприроднадзора Светлана Радионова. Однако она отметила, что самой крупной самке пока не удалось выбраться с мели. — Начался отлив. Спасатели вынужденно отошли к берегу. Трое спасшихся животных кружат рядом, где поглубже, не уплывают далеко от попавшей в западню мамы, — заявила Радионова в своем Telegram -канале. До этого на Камчатке спасли четырех косаток . По словам министра по чрезвычайным ситуациям в регионе Сергея Лебедева, для помощи животным была организована полноценная операция. Инцидент с группой косаток произошел возле села Устьевое 2 октября. Из-за сильного отлива воды образовалось мелководье , косатки не могли дышать. Спасатели поливали их водой и постепенно перемещали в более глубокое место, чтобы стая смогла самостоятельно отплыть в открытое море. Все работы эксперты проводили вручную, потому что техника не могла добраться до места происшествия.

title: Un contrat entre les collectivités et l’Etat ? La proposition inflammable de Barnier
content: Ce passage est passé relativement inaperçu, dans un discours de 33 pages émaillé d’improvisations. Lors de sa déclaration de politique générale devant l’Assemblée nationale , mardi 1er octobre, Michel Barnier a mis sur la table la nécessité, "quarante ans après les grandes lois de décentralisation, [de] bâtir un nouveau contrat de responsabilité entre les collectivités locales et l’Etat." Responsabilité, le terme est lourd de sens. Ces derniers mois, les départements, les régions et les communes, ont été pointés du doigt par Bercy en raison de l’augmentation significative de leurs dépenses. En juillet dernier, une note de la Direction générale des finances publiques anticipait que cette dérive allait aggraver le déficit de la France de 16 milliards d’euros en 2024. A plusieurs reprises, Bruno Le Maire a cherché à enjoindre les collectivités à participer à l’effort de redressement. Ces griefs ont eu du mal à passer auprès des élus locaux . "On laisse penser que le déficit public serait de la responsabilité des collectivités, alors qu’il est du fait de l’Etat", soutient Jean-Léonce Dupont, président du conseil départemental du Calvados. "On était dans un langage infantilisant qui ne faisait qu’amplifier le problème. L’exécutif après avoir creusé des trous dans la coque du bateau 'Etat', voulait s’en prendre aux canots de sauvetage que sont les collectivités", traduit en image David Lisnard, le maire de Cannes et président de...

title: En su retorno a Libertadores: La U tendrá que jugar un partido sin público para cumplir sanción que arrastra desde 2020
creator: Valentina Sánchez Cárdenas
content: La escuadra azul sufrió un castigo de la Conmebol, luego de que un grupo de hinchas provocara un incendio en la galería sur en un partido de la fase previa de Libertadores. Los buenos resultados que ha tenido Universidad de Chile en el Campeonato Nacional la llevaron nuevamente a clasificar a la Copa Libertadores , luego de tres años sin disputar torneos internacionales. Sin embargo, la buena noticia vino acompañada de una mala, ya que los dirigidos por Gustavo Álvarez arrastran una sanción vigente desde 2020. El 4 de febrero de ese año, algunos hinchas azules provocaron un incendio en la galería sur del Estadio Nacional, durante un partido con Inter de Porto Alegre en la fase previa de Libertadores. Lee también: Reprograman partido de este sábado entre Universidad de Chile y Unión La Calera: ¿A qué hora será? Después de la situación, la Conmebol tomó una drástica decisión e impuso un castigo a la U de dos partidos como local sin presencia de público , además de una multa para Azul Azul de US$ 200.000. Si bien el primer partido sin público se cumplió en 2021, en la fase 2 de Libertadores contra San Lorenzo de Almagro, todavía quedaba el segundo. Como los castigos se demoran cinco años en prescribir, en su primer partido de regreso a la copa, la escuadra azul tendrá que hacerlo sin público local , para así cumplir con lo dictado por el ente rector del fútbol continental.

title: LME monitors tightness in aluminium market after spike in spread
creator: Reuters
content: By Eric Onstad LONDON (Reuters) - The London Metal Exchange (LME) is tracking tightness in the aluminium market, which has seen a key spread shoot to a sizeable premium and one party amass a large long or bullish position in the October contract. "The LME is closely monitoring the tightness in the aluminium market and has the necessary controls in place to ensure continued market orderliness," the LME said on Wednesday in response to a request for comment. The premium of LME October aluminium over November hit $18 a metric ton on Wednesday from a premium of $5.85 about three weeks ago and a discount of $17.50 in July. So far the benchmark aluminium contract has seen scant impact from the surge in spread activity, but this could change ahead of the October expiry in about two weeks if those with short or bearish positions scramble to cover, traders said. If short positions are not settled on expiry by delivering physical material, buying back positions can lead to sharp price rises. The tight spread position didn't resonate on the outright dominant contract - the LME three month aluminium was down 0.5% at $2,634 a ton in official trading on Wednesday. BIG LONG POSITION LME data shows that one party is holding a long position in October accounting for over 40% of market open interest. Arrayed on the other side of the market are five short positions, each accounting for up to 9% of open interest. Traders say the issue is complicated by a concentration of LME aluminium...

title: Llegan a Fuerteventura y El Hierro dos embarcaciones con 104 migrantes a bordo
creator: Efe
content: , entre ellos tres menores, han llegado a primeras horas de la tarde de este miércoles a según han confirmado a EFE fuentes de Salvamento Marítimo, que han señalado que se encuentran en aparente buen estado de salud. La salvamar junto con la neumática han atracado en el muelle de Gran Tarajal, en Fuerteventura, donde los migrantes han sido atendidos por el dispositivo de emergencias desplegado sobre el terreno. title: Is Aledo’s district win streak in trouble? State-ranked Denton Ryan is a serious challenge
creator: Fort Worth Star-Telegram
content: The Aledo Bearcats have won 122 consecutive UIL high school football district games. Former head coach Tim Buchanan orchestrated one of the most legendary streaks in history. Now, Robby Jones has played a pivotal role in protecting Aledo’s legendary reputation. Aledo will face Denton Ryan at 7 p.m. Friday at Tim Buchanon Stadium in what is possibly the Texas high school football game of the year. The Raiders (4-0) are No. 1 ranked Class 5A Division I team in Texas, while Aledo holds the No. 2 spot. Jones is in his second year as Aledo’s head coach, but he isn’t a stranger to the pressure. He has served as Aledo’s offensive coordinator since 2000, long before the historic district win streak began on October 12, 2007. It’s been nearly 17 years since the start of the streak. Some of the players on Aledo’s varsity team weren’t born yet, and others were infants. For these players, they’ve never seen anything but Aledo’s consistent dominance. The Bearcats haven’t won a state title every year, but the district win streak was a constant and a sign of the program’s greatness. A win streak of this magnitude requires elite preparation and consistency; one bad day or a span of bad luck could ruin it. Obviously, no one wants to be on the team that loses the streak. It comes with a lot of pressure, which Aledo is used to. No school in Texas has higher expectations than Aledo, which holds the with 12 state championships. The upcoming matchup, however, has little to do with pressure and...

title: Celine Announces Successor Following Hedi Slimane Exit
creator: info@hypebeast.com (Hypebeast)
content: Early Wednesday morning it was confirmed by LVMH that Celine creative director Hedi Slimane would be departing from his role after seven years of leading the French luxury house. The famed designer held tenures at Dior Homme and Saint Laurent before taking the reigns at Celine following Phoebe Philo’s 2018 departure. In a statement provided to WWD , Celine said “Under his creative and artistic direction, Celine has experienced exceptional growth and established itself as an iconic French couture house.” Celine then took to Instagram stories on Wednesday morning to announce the appointment of the house’s new creative director Michael Rider , former creative director of Polo Ralph Lauren. According to Business of Fashion , Slimane was estimated to have doubled revenue for the brand to €2.5B EUR, a record breaking milestone in the brand’s history. The designer was also behind a number of rebranding initiatives including dropping the accent mark and “Paris” from the name of the house. Since early 2024, rumors have to swirled regarding Slimane’s potential departure after a source told BoF that he and LVMH had difficulty settling “thorny” contract negotiations. The news of his exit comes no more than a week since Slimane presented Celine’s SS25 show in Paris.

title: What is NASCAR's charter? Explaining rule that left Michael Jordan's 23XI furious
creator: Joshua Lees
content: Michael Jordan’s 23XI Racing team and Front Row Sports have filed a lawsuit against NASCAR over the organization’s charter system, but what exactly does this entail? It was revealed on Wednesday that Jordan’s setup, as well as their Front Row Sports rivals, had taken legal action against NASCAR due to the league’s efforts to “enrich themselves at the expense of the premier stock car racing teams.” “I love the sport of racing and the passion of our fans, but the way NASCAR is run today is unfair to teams, drivers, sponsors and fans,” the NBA legend said in a statement. “Today’s action shows I’m willing to fight for a competitive market where everyone wins.” Michael Jordan's 23XI Racing and Front Row Motorsports file lawsuit against NASCAR Ross Chastain just showed he hasn't listened to Ryan Blaney's NASCAR outburst The charter system is one that operates similarly to franchises in other sports, however, it gives teams less say in the future direction of the sport. Charters were introduced back in 2016, which allowed team owners the chance to take “an increased business certainty and the ability to work more closely with NASCAR.” Taking a charter guarantees entry into the field of every NASCAR Cup Series points race, which in turn allows them to take a portion of the purse. With NASCAR signing a mega-money TV deal for 2025, teams have been in negotiations over an extension on the original agreement in 2016, with the hopes of making their charter permanent. These charters will...

title: Nuova ondata di maltempo: a Faenza un nuovo muro di cemento, teloni sugli argini più fragili
content: Dopo la terza alluvione nel giro di appena 16 mesi, ogni previsione di nuovi temporali fa paura, soprattutto su un suolo già saturo come quello delle zone colpite dagli allagamenti nei giorni scorsi. title: Kocaeli'de eniştesini tabancayla katleden sanığın cezası belli oldu
content: Kocaeli 3. Ağır Ceza Mahkemesince görülen davanın duruşmasına, tutuklu sanık R.A, maktul Hüseyin Y'nin yakınları ve taraf avukatları katıldı. Müşteki avukatı Serkan Erdem, sanığın eylemi planlı gerçekleştirdiğini ve bunun için kasten öldürmenin nitelikli halinden cezalandırılması gerektiğini savunarak, "Sanığın silah tedarikine girdiği sabittir, silahı ateşe hazır halde tutmuştur. Tanıklar olay yerine bıçak görmemiştir, bıçaklar mutfakta bulunmuştur. Sanık indirim almak için bıçak kurgusu uydurmuştur. Sanığa indirim uygulanmamasını talep ediyoruz." ifadelerini kullandı. Daha önceki savunmalarını tekrar ettiğini beyan eden sanık R.A, olay günü kendisini korumak amacıyla hareket ettiğini öne sürerek, "Keşke bu olay yaşanmasaydı. Keşke o gün oraya gitmeseydim. Kendi hayatımı kurmaya çalışan bir insanım. Malulen emekli olma ihtimalim vardı, iş bulmuştum. Ablam da yanıma gelecekti." diye konuştu. Kararını açıklayan mahkeme heyeti, "kasten öldürme" suçundan müebbet hapse mahkum ettiği R.A'nın cezasını, sanığın "eylemini maktulden kaynaklanan haksız saldırıya karşı gerçekleştirdiği" gerekçesiyle takdiri indirim uygulayarak 12 yıl hapse çevirdi. Mahkeme ayrıca sanığı "ruhsatsız silah taşıma" suçundan 2 yıl hapis cezasına çarptırdı. Yenişehir Mahallesi Ahmet Ziya Sokak'ta 2 Eylül 2023'te R.A. ile ablasının boşanma aşamasındaki eşi Hüseyin Y. arasında tartışma çıkmıştı. R.A'nın tabancayla ateş etmesi sonucu...

title: "Filistin'den tek farkımız" sözleriyle açıkladı: Bizim yanımızda Türkiye vardı
content: KKTC Başbakanı Üstel, Cumhurbaşkanı Yardımcısı Cevdet Yılmaz ile bir araya geldi. Cumhurbaşkanlığı Külliyesi'ndeki görüşme öncesinde basın mensuplarına konuşan Üstel, Ankara'da bulunmaktan memnuniyet duyduğunu belirterek, "Cumhurbaşkanı Recep Tayyip Erdoğan'ın, üç sene arka arkaya, önce Birleşmiş Milletler (BM) 77. Genel Kurulu'nda ve BM 78. Genel Kurulu'nda Kuzey Kıbrıs Türk Cumhuriyetini tanıyın diye dünyaya çağrıları oldu. Bunun üzerine Azerbaycan, KKTC Cumhurbaşkanı ve beni Başbakan olarak, biz ilk defa üçüncü bir ülkede devlet protokolüyle karşılandık." diye konuştu. KKTC'nin Azerbaycan ile hem sosyal, hem ekonomik, hem de kültürel ilişkilerinin başladığını söyleyen Üstel, BM 79. Genel Kurulu'nda da KKTC'nin tanınmasına yönelik çağrı yapan Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan'a teşekkür etti. Üstel, "Bu doğrultuda, biz KKTC'nin gerek ekonomisini gerekse ihtiyaç duyduğu büyük projeleri, gerekse altyapı çalışmalarını daha iyi bir noktaya getirmek için ve dünyadaki yerimizi güçlü hale getirmek için, KKTC için elimizden gelen gayreti gösteriyoruz." diye konuştu. Bütün baskılara ve izole etmelere rağmen, Cumhurbaşkanı Yardımcısı Cevdet Yılmaz ile imzalanan "İktisadi, Mali İşbirliği Protokolü" çerçevesinde Türkiye ile KKTC'yi bulunduğu yerden daha iyi noktaya getirmek için çalıştıklarını kaydetti. Üstel, "İnanıyorum ki, ilerleyen günlerde bütün bu olumsuzluklara rağmen Kuzey Kıbrıs Türk Cumhuriyeti...

title: Helene Kasırgası ABD'de kabusa yol açtı! Ölü sayısı 166'ya yükseldi
content: ABD'nin Florida eyaletinde geçtiğimiz hafta perşembe günü gece saatlerinde kategori 4 seviyesinde karaya çıkan Helene Kasırgası nedeniyle can kaybı artıyor. Kasırganın etkili olduğu Florida, Georgia, Virginia, Tennessee, Güney Carolina ve Kuzey Carolina eyaletlerinde toplam can kaybı 166'ya yükseldi. ABD Başkan Joe Biden'ın Kuzey Carolina'yı, Başkan Yardımcısı Kamala Harris'in ise Georgia eyaletini ziyaret etmesi bekleniyor.

title: Terör örgütü DEAŞ saldırılarına devam ediyor: Kerkük'te 4 asker hayatını kaybetti
content: Irak İçişleri Bakanlığından yapılan yazılı açıklamada, Kerkük kentinin güneyindeki Vadi Zegetun bölgesinde Irak ordusuna ait bir devriye aracının geçişi sırasında yola yerleştirilen bombanın uzaktan kumandayla patlatıldığı belirtildi. Açıklamada, terör örgütü DEAŞ tarafından gerçekleştirilen saldırıda 4 askerin öldüğü, 3 askerin yaralandığı kaydedildi. Terör örgütü DEAŞ, Haziran 2014'te Irak'ın Musul, Salahaddin ve Enbar vilayetlerinin tamamı ile Diyala ve Kerkük illerinin bir kısmını ele geçirmiş, söz konusu bölgeler yıllar içinde örgütten geri alınmıştı. Irak'ın DEAŞ'tan temizlenmesinin üzerinden 7 yıl geçmesine rağmen terör örgütü söz konusu vilayetlerin kırsal bölgelerinde saldırılar düzenlemeye devam ediyor.

title: Ağrı'da meydana gelen kazada 1 asker şehit oldu
content: MSB, Ağrı'da meydana gelen araç kazasında Piyade Uzman Çavuş Burak Geniş'in şehit olduğunu bildirdi. MSB'den yapılan açıklamada, şu ifadelere yer verildi: "Ağrı'da meydana gelen araç kazasında kahraman silah arkadaşımız Piyade Uzman Çavuş Burak Geniş şehit olmuştur. Bizleri derin bir acı ve üzüntüye boğan bu olayda hayatını kaybeden aziz şehidimize Allah'tan rahmet, kederli ailesine, Türk Silahlı Kuvvetleri ile asil milletimize başsağlığı ve sabır dileriz." Milli Savunma Bakanı Yaşar Güler de yayımladığı mesajında, şehit Geniş'e Allah'tan rahmet, ailesine ve Türk milletine başsağlığı diledi.

title: Apartman yangınında mahsur kalan 1'i bebek 8 kişi kurtarıldı
content: Kocaeli'nin Çayırova ilçesinde bir apartmanda çıkan yangında 8 kişi yoğun duman sebebiyle içeride mahsur kaldı. Yangın, Çayırova Mahallesi 5211. Sokak'ta bulunan 5 katlı apartmanın zemin katında meydana geldi. Dairenin zemin katında çıkan yangın sebebiyle yoğun dumandan dolayı 8 kişi mahsur kalarak dışarı çıkamadı. İhbar üzerine olay yerine itfaiye, sağlık ve polis ekipleri sevk edildi. Kısa sürede olay yerine gelen itfaiye ekipleri yangını söndürürken, dairede mahsur kalan 8 kişiyi sepetli merdiven yardımıyla tahliye etti. Biri bebek 5 kişi hastaneye kaldırılırken, dumandan etkilenen diğer 3 kişiye ise olay yerinde müdahale edildi. Yangın sebebiyle zemin kattaki dairede hasar meydana gelirken, polis olayla ilgili inceleme başlattı. İtfaiye ekipleri tarafından kurtarılan vatandaşlardan biri bebek 5 kişinin hastaneye kaldırıldığı ve yoğun bakım servisinde tedavi altına alındığı bildirildi.

title: Bakan Işıkhan, Şişli ve Bodrum Belediye Başkanlarını kabul etti
content: Çalışma ve Sosyal Güvenlik Bakanı Vedat Işıkhan, Şişli Belediye Başkanı Resul Emrah Şahan'ı ve Bodrum Belediye Başkanı Tamer Mandalinci'yi Bakanlık binasında kabul etti. Gerçekleşen görüşmelerin ardından Bakan Işıkhan, sosyal medya hesabından paylaşım yaptı. Bakan Işıkhan, Şişli Belediye Başkanı Resul Emrah Şahan'la görüşmesine ilişkin, "Şişli Belediye Başkanı Sayın Resul Emrah Şahan'ı bakanlığımızda kabul ettik. İlçemizin çalışma hayatı ve sosyal güvenlik alanlarını ilgilendiren gündem maddelerini ele alarak, taleplerine yönelik çözüm odaklı istişarede bulunduk. Nazik ziyaretleri için kendilerine teşekkür ediyorum" açıklamasını yaptı. Bakan Işıkhan, Bodrum Belediye Başkanı Tamer Mandalinci'yle olan görüşmesiyle ilgili yaptığı paylaşımda ise, "Bodrum Belediye Başkanı Sayın Tamer Mandalinci ile bakanlığımızda bir araya geldik. Doğal zenginlikleriyle ülkemizin en önemli turizm merkezlerinden olan Bodrum'un çalışma hayatına yönelik görüş alışverişinde bulunduk. Nazik ziyaretleri için kendilerine teşekkür ediyorum" ifadelerine yer verdi.

title: Sakaryaspor'un yeni teknik patronu Mesut Bakkal
content: Trendyol 1. Lig ekibi Sakaryaspor'da Suat Kaya'dan boşalan teknik direktörlük görevine Mesut Bakkal getirildi. Kulübün sosyal medya hesabından yapılan paylaşımda, "Kulübümüz teknik direktörlük görevi için Mesut Bakkal ile anlaşmaya varmıştır. Hoş geldin Mesut Bakkal." ifadelerine yer verildi.

title: Man, 33, arrested after two females found dead in Courtice, Ont., home: Durham police
creator: The Canadian Press
content: COURTICE, ONT. — Police in Durham Region say a 33-year-old man has been arrested after two females were found dead in a home in Courtice, Ont. Durham Regional Police say they responded to a home in east Courtice for a wellbeing check just after 1 p.m. Tuesday. They say when officers arrived, they found the bodies of two females suffering from "obvious signs of trauma." They say a child also found inside the home was uninjured. Police say a 33-year-old man was arrested on scene without incident. They say the homicide unit is investigating and they're asking anyone with information to come forward. This report by The Canadian Press was first published Oct. 2, 2024. The Canadian Press

title: İran'dan 'nükleer tesislere saldırı ihtimali' açıklaması: Silahlı kuvvetler gerekli caydırıcılığı sağlıyor
content: İran Atom Enerjisi Kurumu Başkanı Muhammed İslami, bugün gerçekleştirilen kabine toplantısının ardından açıklamalarda bulundu. Yeni nükleer müzakerelerin başlamasına değinen İslami, "Asıl önemli olan, nükleer programımız etrafında tüm gürültülerin ve öne sürülen bahanelerin yaptırımların kaldırılmasına yönelik müzakerelerle bağlantılı olmasıdır. Bu müzakereleri ise Dışişleri Bakanlığı yürütmektedir" ifadelerini kullandı. İsrail'in İran'ın nükleer tesislerine saldırı düzenleyeceği iddiasını değerlendiren İslami, "İsrail, her zaman bu tür iddialarda bulundu ve bulunmaya devam ediyor. Siyonist rejim, vahşi bir rejimdir. Netanyahu vampir gibi davranıyor ve dünya genelinde bu rejime karşı ciddi eleştiriler var. Böyle deli bir kişiden ne beklenebilir ki? İran'ın caydırıcılığı, silahlı kuvvetlerin sorumluluğunda ve bu görev başarıyla yerine getirilmektedir" dedi. ABD'li haber sitesi Axios, İsrailli yetkililerin İran'ın dün gerçekleştirdiği füze saldırısına "İsrail'in misilleme olarak İran'ın nükleer tesislerine saldırı da dahil olmak üzere tüm seçeneklerin masada olacağı" uyarısında bulunduğunu belirtmişti.

title: Come funziona il certificato di malattia e come gestire l'assenza dal lavoro
content: Il è un documento fondamentale per i lavoratori che si trovano nella necessità di giustificare un’assenza dal luogo di lavoro per . Questo certificato, rilasciato dal medico, attesta l’ . Nel corso degli anni, il processo per ottenere e inviare questo documento ha subito significative trasformazioni, soprattutto con l’introduzione del . Cerchiamo di capire, nel dettaglio, tutti gli aspetti legati al certificato di malattia: dalle caratteristiche a come richiederlo, passando per la comunicazione con il datore di lavoro e il regolamento da rispettare. Ecco cosa fare per evitare incomprensioni e, talvolta, anche sanzioni. Come funziona il certificato di malattia? A chi si richiede? In caso di evento morboso che non permetta al lavoratore di prestare temporaneamente la propria capacità lavorativa, esso può assentarsi dal posto di lavoro per . In questi casi, il lavoratore conserva un particolare istituto, denominato “ ”, che consente a quest’ultimo di ricevere comunque la retribuzione per le giornate di assenza. La tutela, però, è subordinata all’esibizione del , ossia a quel documento – ormai telematizzato – nel quale si attesta effettivamente che il lavoratore è in uno stato di salute non idoneo per lavorare. Ma a chi si richiede esattamente il certificato di malattia? La risposta è semplice: dipende dal . Una volta ottenuto il certificato, la sua . Questa comunicazione può avvenire tramite diversi canali, come vedremo più avanti. La tempestività nella consegna del...

title: La Xunta explica las ayudas a los afectados por la Enfermedad Hemorrágica Epizoótica: plazos y cuantía
creator: La Región
content: La Xunta de Galicia destinará 5,6 millones de euros para paliar los daños causados por la Enfermedad Hemorrágica Epizoótica en las explotaciones de la comunidad afectadas por esta dolencia que afecta a algunos animales. La conselleira de Medio Rural, María José Gómez, se reunió este miércoles con los responsables de Asaga y Unións Agrarias Agrarias para abordar estas ayudas. La conselleira de Medio Rural informó en la reunión que estas ayudas se harán efectivas al finalizar el periodo de actividad del mosquito vector y transmisor de la Enfermedad Hemorrágica Epizoótica, que se espera que sea a mediados de noviembre con la bajada de temperaturas. Una decisión que, según la Xunta, permitirá que los fondos lleguen a todas las explotaciones afectadas este año por el EHE, a mayores de las del 2023. Además, la conselleira trasladó a los ganaderos que el sistema de reparto de las ayudas será directoa . Los profesionales del sector solo deberán presentar una aceptación de ayuda, sin necesidad de juntar ninguna otra documentación. La Xunta pagará desde los 400 euros por animal de menos de cuatro meses hasta los 1.600 por las vacas adultas muertas a causa de esta enfermedad. A mayores, 20 euros por animal censado en la explotación afectada , desde un mínimo de 140 hasta un máximo de 4.000 por explotación. Además, la Xunta destaca que Galicia "foi pioneira" en España en hacerse cargo de los costes de la vacuna contra la lengua azul con nueve millones de...

title: 0-4. El City se divierte en Bratislava y supera un bache
creator: EFE
content: Sin oposición alguna, con un dominio abusivo y ante un rival mucho más débil, el Manchester City cumplió un trámite, goleó 0-4 al Slovan Bratislava y aparcó su pequeña crisis de resultados tras tres empates en sus últimos cuatro partidos oficiales. Gündogan, Foden, Haaland y McAtee sellaron los primeros tres puntos en la fase de grupos para el Manchester City, que en su estreno pinchó ante el Inter y necesitaba tomar impulso en la competición con una victoria. Los cuatro tantos, que pudieron ser muchos más, evidenciaron una superioridad aplastante que dejó clara la gran diferencia que existe entre algunos clubes en el nuevo formato de la competición. El conjunto ‘citizen’ vivió una noche plácida en Bratislava para regresar la senda de la victoria después de una racha errática. Los hombres dirigidos por Pep Guardiola se encontraron al mejor rival posible para tomar impulso después de firmar tres empates y una victoria en sus últimos cuatro encuentros (pincharon frente al Inter, Arsenal y Newcastle). El Slovan Bratislava, en su primera participación de la historia en una fase de grupos, fue una marioneta para el Manchester City, que no tuvo piedad de un rival que ya fue goleado por el Celtic en la primera jornada (5-1). Pero el cuadro eslovaco parece que sabe perfectamente cuál es su papel en la Liga de Campeones: su misión, disfrutar de cada encuentro, que es una fiesta para sus aficionados pese a que, si no hay sorpresas, se avecinan duras derrotas....

title: На Украине исключили возможность отставки главы разведки
creator: Илья Таксюр
content: Отставка начальника Главного управления разведки (ГУР) Министерства обороны Украины Кирилла Буданова ( внесен в перечень террористов и экстремистов Росфинмониторинга ) не обсуждается. Об этом заявил министр обороны страны Рустем Умеров , сообщает депутат Верховной Рады Юрий Мысягин в своем Telegram -канале. По словам парламентария, 1 октября проходило заседание комитета Верховной Рады по вопросам национальной безопасности, обороны и разведки. На нем присутствовал Умеров, и его попросили прокомментировать появляющиеся новости относительно замены Буданова. Он ответил, что на сегодня этот вопрос не обсуждается. Ранее на Украине допустили увольнение Буданова президентом Украины Владимиром Зеленским . Отмечалось, что президент рассматривает его как потенциального конкурента на выборах главы страны.

title: Sicherheitslücke ermöglicht Fernzugriff auf Kia-Autos
creator: Gayathri Albert
content: Aufgrund einer Sicherheitslücke ist es möglich gewesen, aus der Ferne auf Kia-Fahrzeuge zuzugreifen. Ein Forschungsteam gelang es sogar, sich sogar als unsichtbaren zweiten Besitzer anmelden. Das Problem sei aber inzwischen behoben. Eine Sicherheitslücke bei Kia hat den Zugriff auf die Fahrzeuge des südkoreanischen Autoherstellers aus der Ferne ermöglicht. Mit einem eigenen Händler-Token und der Fahrzeugidentifikationsnummer (VIN) eines Autos konnte ein Forschungsteam für Cybersicherheit auf das Fahrzeug zugreifen. Dies ermöglichte das Orten von Millionen von Kia-Autos innert 30 Sekunden, wie "Heise" berichtet. Das Forschungsteam rund um den ethischen Hacker Sam Curry zeigt auf dessen Blog , wie einfach sie mit einer eigens entwickelten App die mit dem Internet verbundenen Funktionen der Fahrzeuge kapern konnten. Sie konnten beispielsweise persönliche Daten des Besitzers oder Besitzerin abrufen. Das Forschungsteam konnte zudem die Zugriffsdaten des Fahrzeughalters anpassen, um sich als unsichtbaren Besitzer des Autos anzumelden. Danach konnten sie Befehle an das Fahrzeug senden, wie zum Beispiel den Motor zu starten. Von all dem bekamen die eigentlichen Fahrzeughalterinnen oder -halter nichts mit. (Source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jMHFCpQdZyg) Das Token (eine Art Schlüssel), der mit der VIN verbunden ist, wird beim Kauf eines neuen Kia-Fahrzeugs vom Händler generiert. Damit stellt der Händler normalerweise sicher, dass alles korrekt funktioniert und noch...

title: Jackpot: Painting That Junk Dealer Picked Up In 1962 Is A Picasso Creation, Worth Rs 55 Cr!
creator: OB Bureau
content: Rome: Italian junk dealer Luigi Lo Rosso’s family will soon be millionaires as the junk dealer had picked up Picasso’s painting, worth millions, from a cleaning space in 1962. According to a report in The Guardian, when the junk dealer found the painting, he wasn’t aware that it was a creation by the renowned Pablo Picasso. Despite his wife’s wish to discard it, the junk dealer retained the painting, bound in a cheap frame. Years later, Italian experts have claimed it is an original Picasso painting worth Rs 55.98 crore in Indian currency. Lo Rosso’s son Andrea, who studied the encyclopaedia of art history, reached out to a team of experts, including well-known art detective Maurizio Seracini, to know about the painting. The painting bears Picasso’s signature on the top left corner, as confirmed by Cinzia Altieri, a graphologist and member of the scientific committee of Arcadia Foundation. It is believed that the painting is a distorted image of Picasso’s mistress and muse Dora Maar. According to reports, the painting is believed to have been produced between 1930 and 1936. “My father was from Capri and would collect junk to sell for next to nothing. He found the painting before I was even born and didn’t have a clue who Picasso was. He wasn’t a very cultured person. While reading about Picasso’s works in the encyclopaedia I would look up at the painting and compare it to his signature. I kept telling my father it was similar, but he didn’t understand. But as I grew up, I...

title: Los padres del IES La Rábida de Huelva piden una solución para las "elevadas ratios y la falta de profesores en el centro"
Israel confirma la muerte en combate de un primer soldado israelí en el Líbano
creator: Redacción Periodiquito
content: El Ejército israelí confirmó este miércoles la muerte en combate de un primer soldado israelí en el sur del Líbano, desde que el Ejército iniciara una invasión terrestre el martes de madrugada. El soldado fue identificado como Eitan Itzhak Oster de 22 años, natural de la ciudad israelí de Modin, próxima a Jerusalén, y comandante de la Unidad Egoz del Ejército. Se trata de la primera baja militar en suelo libanés desde la guerra de 2006 entre Israel e Hizbulá. Este miércoles por primera vez el Ejército habló ya de “choques a corta distancia” en los que asegura que sus soldados de la División 98a, en cooperación con la fuerza aérea, eliminaron a milicianos. “Hasta ahora, más de 150 infraestructuras” han sido destruidas en ataques aéreos, según el texto, incluidos cuarteles generales de Hizbulá, instalaciones de almacenamiento de armas y lanzacohetes. Las fuerzas israelíes detallaron, también este miércoles y en otro comunicado, que la División 36, que incluye brigadas acorazadas y de infantería, se unirán a la ofensiva, que además recibirá apoyo de la fuerza aérea y artillería. El grupo chií Hizbulá, por su parte, anunció en un comunicado, por primera vez, enfrentamientos contra un grupo de soldados israelíes “infiltrados” en la localidad sureña de Maron al Ras, pegada a la línea divisoria común, e insinuaba haber causado muertos. Las fuerzas armadas mantienen su ofensiva en el sur de Líbano, habiendo bombardeado también en numerosas...

title: PICTURES: Time to have and give hope – Bishop Leahy tells Limerick Diocesan Assembly
creator: Donal O'Regan
content: Addressing a recent Limerick Diocesan Assembly held in preparation for the new pastoral year, Bishop Leahy said we should all lean into the theme of Pope Francis 2025 ‘Jubilee Year of Hope’. Attendees at the assembly included parish representatives, religious orders, associations and other groups across the Diocese. Bishop Leahy said that Pope Francis wants next year’s jubilee to be a year of prayerful hope for a world suffering the impacts of war, the ongoing effects of Covid-19 pandemic, and climate crisis. The year will begin on Christmas Eve with the opening of the Holy Door of Saint Peter’s Basilica, and on December 29, bishops will celebrate Mass in each diocese as the solemn opening of the Holy Year, and thereafter events will be organised locally. Speaking after the Limerick Diocesan Assembly, Bishop Leahy said: “We had the assembly to prepare for the pastoral year ahead and this coming year dovetails brilliantly with Pope Francis’ Jubilee of Hope as hope is something we all need to have and something we need to give to others. “Hope is something we especially need today. On the one hand we have a country with an economy that we’re told has never been stronger, on the other we are listening to a constant refrain of homelessness, challenges with addiction, people on the margins. We’ve the harrowing situation in the Middle East with the horrors there reaching into all our hearts. Many people have had their lives changed irrecoverably by Covid, not least many elderly."...

title: Navratri procession: Traffic restrictions in city today
content: Thiruvananthapuram : City police have imposed traffic restrictions in the city from 11am to 8pm on Thursday in view of the Navratri idol procession. The procession carrying Navratri idols from Padmanabhapuram palace will reach Pallichal by 11am, and by 2pm the procession will reach Karamana . The procession is supposed to arrive at the Sree Padmanabhaswamy Temple by 6:30pm. Vehicles will not be allowed to park beside the road on the stretch from Pallichal to the temple between 11am to 8pm. Police will use recovery vans to remove vehicles if found parked beside the road, and legal measures will be initiated. When the procession reaches Avadayamman Temple at Karamana, traffic will be redirected via Karamana-Killipalam Road. Vehicles to Thampanoor from Karamana must take Kalpalayam-Kochalummoodu-Poojappura-Jagathy-Thycaud Road. No restriction will be in place for vehicles from Thampanoor to Karamana. From 4pm till 11pm, vehicles from Poojappura to Jagathi must travel via Poojappura round as vehicular movement will be restricted only in one direction on Poojappura-Chadiyara Road from Jagathy. Parking of vehicles will be prohibited on the road around Poojappura ground and from Poojappura round till the police station. Poojappura LBS, Centre for Science and Technology compounds can be used for parking vehicles. The public is urged to cooperate with the restrictions for the smooth conduct of the festival and share their complaints and suggestions on 9497930055 or 0471-2558731.

title: Diese Gemeinde liegt gleichzeitig in Baden-Württemberg und in der Schweiz
creator: Stephanie Bach
content: Diese Gemeinde liegt gleichzeitig in Baden-Württemberg und in der Schweiz In Laufenburg überquert man mit nur einem Schritt die EU-Grenze. Entdecken Sie die faszinierende Geschichte dieser geteilten Stadt. Mehr zum Thema Eine Stadt, die sich über zwei Länder erstreckt, ist ein einzigartiges Phänomen im Ländle. Der Rhein teilt die Stadt, die sowohl in Baden-Württemberg als auch in der Schweiz liegt. Die beiden Teile sind seit Jahrhunderten eng miteinander verbunden. „Zwei Länder, eine Stadt“ - unter diesem Leitspruch wird in beiden Teilen von Laufenburg eng zusammengearbeitet. Doch wie hat sich diese einzigartige Stadt entwickelt und warum liegt sie in zwei Ländern? . Gemeinsame Veranstaltungen wie die Fastnacht, der große Herbstmarkt und zahlreiche kulturelle Events im Sommer, die von Deutschen und Schweizern zusammen organisiert werden, unterstreichen diese Verbundenheit. Seit 2022 gibt es zudem einen Rundweg, der die beiden Länder verbindet und bei dem man insgesamt dreimal die EU-Grenze überquert. (sba)

title: Kemi Badenoch puts Tory leadership bid back on track in final round of speeches
creator: David Maddox and Millie Cooke
content: Kemi Badenoch put her faltering leadership campaign back on track with a powerful speech to end the Tory conference. The former business secretary has had a difficult Tory conference with a number of missteps on maternity pay and suggesting some civil servants should go to prison, but her speech to close a four-day trial of strength for the leadership contenders appeared to woo Tory members. The back-back speeches have also confirmed that former home secretary James Cleverly is a contender as MPs prepare to whittle down the number to two next week. His speech received the loudest cheers as he appeared to take on criticisms that his affable nature hides a man who stands for very little. Instead, Mr Cleverly addressed head on his philosophy as a Conservative and what he would do to win back power for the battered Tory party. The final day speeches was less helpful for the frontrunner Robert Jenrick , who ploughed ahead as the candidate of the right but came into the final speeches with a sore throat and jokes about Labour which failed to get many laughs. Meanwhile, Tom Tugendhat , who is vying with Mr Cleverly to be the candidate of the party’s centrists, gave a solid speech which failed to inspire the audience in the hall. Near the end there were awkward laughs when he said: “My friends I get it, you have had enough and so have I.” In her speech, Ms Badenoch went back to her childhood growing up in Nigeria to explain why she is a Conservative. She said: "I was born here, but...

title: NREL to design silicon carbide-based power inverters for US ground combat vehicles
content: News: Microelectronics 2 October 2024 NREL to design silicon carbide-based power inverters for US ground combat vehicles To transform US military ground combat vehicles, the US National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL) has been selected to redesign a critical component: the traction inverter, which controls the flow of electricity between a vehicle’s battery, motor and drivetrain. The new silicon carbide (SiC)-based propulsion system will double the range of Army vehicles with a footprint four times smaller than its predecessors. The three-year, $6m project has been fully funded by the Operational Energy Capability Improvement Fund (OECIF), which guides energy innovations for the US Department of Defense. It will be led by the US Army Combat Capabilities Development Command (DEVCOM), with researchers from both NREL and the Army Research Laboratory (ARL) providing technical expertise. NREL’s power electronics researchers will lead the development of a SiC-based power inverter dubbed PICHOT — a power inverter that is compact in scale and functions at a high operating temperature — that can offer 200% more range to US Army ground combat vehicles. The inverter will be designed, fabricated and characterized in-house at NREL prior to evaluation at the US Army Ground Vehicle Systems Center’s test labs. Its modular design will allow it to slot into many different hybrid-electric ground combat vehicles, from light- to medium-wheeled vehicles to Abrams and Stryker battle tanks....

title: Prosecutors say they may bring additional charges against New York City mayor and indict others
creator: Larry Neumeister And Michael R. Sisak, The Associated Press
content: NEW YORK (AP) — Federal prosecutors said Wednesday that they might bring additional charges against New York City Mayor Eric Adams and indict others in the corruption case against him. Prosecutors made the disclosure during a hearing for Adams days after he was was indicted on charges that he accepted about $100,000 worth of free or deeply discounted flights, hotel stays, meals and entertainment on international trips that he mostly took before he was elected mayor, when he was serving as Brooklyn’s borough president. Prosecutors say the travel perks were arranged by a senior Turkish diplomatic official in New York and Turkish businesspeople who wanted to gain influence with Adams. The indictment alleges that Adams also conspired to receive illegal donations to his political campaigns from foreign sources who weren’t allowed to give money to U.S. political candidates. Assistant U.S. Attorney Hagan Scotten told Judge Dale Ho that it is “quite likely” prosecutors will seek a superseding indictment and that it is “likely” additional defendants will be charged and “possible” that more charges will be brought against Adams. The hearing was the first time Adams, a Democrat, appeared in court since his arraignment on Friday. “Busy. Busy. Busy city. Running the city. Making sure we continue to move forward,” Adams said as he stepped out of a black SUV, put on his jacket and walked up the courthouse steps. Wednesday's hearing wasn't expected to involve a deep exploration of the...

title: Une tentative de remettre le village au milieu de l’Église
content: En contrepoint de l'engouement et de la ferveur que la visite en Belgique du Pape François a suscités chez pas mal de catholiques, ses dires et ses prises de position ont provoqué chez beaucoup stupeur et tremblements. Mon intention n'est pas du tout d'entrer ici dans le détail des polémiques auxquelles les propos papaux ont donné libre champ. Plus modestement, je voudrais tenter de remettre le village au milieu de l'Église et le catholique qui accepte d'être lambda en face-à-face avec le Souverain Pontife. Le 13 mars 2013, l'élection cardinalice de Jorge Mario Bergoglio à la dignité suprême de l'Église en a étonné plus d'un. L'originalité apparente de ce Pape François – son premier mot à la loggia de Saint-Pierre fut un sympathique "Bonsoir" – a fait naître l'espoir : la proximité, le naturel, l'humanité d'un pasteur allaient-ils imprégner et transformer l'Église, qui avait un besoin criant de ces élixirs de jouvence ? Onze ans plus tard, regardons l'Église, entendons le Pape. Que reste-t-il de ces beaux jours ? Grâce à Dieu, ni en 2013 ni jamais, la fonction de pape ne métamorphose un être humain, même pétri de qualités, en génie ni en superman. L'élu se voit investi d'une charge lourde, voire écrasante. Sa foi lui permet de l'assumer. Ce n'est pas une "superfoi". De ce point de vue, un pape est sur le même pied que tout autre croyant, avec des convictions et des doutes, des ombres et des lumières. L'état de santé actuel du Pape...

title: Eaton taps VSTECS as official distributor for UPS solutions in the Philippines
creator: TDT
content: MANILA, PHILIPPINES – Eaton, an intelligent power management company, has appointed VSTECS Phils., Inc. as the authorized distributor of its uninterruptible power supply (UPS) solutions in the Philippines. Since its founding in 1998, VSTECS has established itself as a leading provider of information technology solutions, offering a wide range of IT products and services tailored to meet the needs of businesses in the country. Given the frequent natural disasters and power fluctuations in the Philippines, investing in reliable power management is crucial to safeguarding IT hardware and preventing costly downtime. Through its partnership with VSTECS, Eaton aims to provide the local market with both single-phase and three-phase UPS products designed to ensure operational continuity, protect critical infrastructure, and allow precise monitoring and control for optimized performance and efficiency. “In today’s power-dependent landscape, the ability to safeguard against power disruptions is critical. Together, Eaton and VSTECS are set to support businesses in maintaining their operations seamlessly, even in the face of power challenges," said Jimmy Yam, Vice President and General Manager of Eaton's Electrical Sector for East Asia. "This partnership also enables VSTECS' channel partners to offer tailored, cost-effective power management solutions, enhancing their value proposition and competitive edge in the market.” VSTECS President and CEO Jimmy Go expressed excitement about the...

title: New Brunswick election: Liberals offer plan to make life better for seniors
creator: The Canadian Press
content: FREDERICTON — New Brunswick's Liberal party is promising to improve how the province supports seniors if elected to govern on Oct. 21. Liberal Leader Susan Holt campaigned in Neguac, N.B., this morning where she announced eight proposals, including a pledge to offer $250 a month to unpaid and informal caregivers who are looking after aging family members. Holt says a Liberal government would improve home care by investing in the wages for personal support workers and resident attendants, as well as expanding programs that help seniors stay in their homes as long as possible. As for nursing homes, Holt says the Liberals would improve wages and fill staffing gaps to ensure all existing nursing home beds are being used. Holt says there are 1,108 people on waiting lists for long-term care and 550 are in hospital beds waiting for a place in a nursing home. The Liberals also pledged to raise the "comfort and clothing allowance" for seniors from $150 to $200, and develop a strategy to improve support for those living with Alzheimer's disease and dementia. “Our team will ensure that seniors receive the support they need in a way that promotes well-being and independence,” Holt said in a statement. This report by The Canadian Press was first published Oct. 2, 2024. The Canadian Press

title: New Brunswick election: Liberals offer plan to make life better for seniors
creator: Canadian Press
content: FREDERICTON — New Brunswick's Liberal party is promising to improve how the province supports seniors if elected to govern on Oct. 21. Liberal Leader Susan Holt campaigned in Neguac, N.B., this morning where she announced eight proposals, including a pledge to offer $250 a month to unpaid and informal caregivers who are looking after aging family members. Holt says a Liberal government would improve home care by investing in the wages for personal support workers and resident attendants, as well as expanding programs that help seniors stay in their homes as long as possible. As for nursing homes, Holt says the Liberals would improve wages and fill staffing gaps to ensure all existing nursing home beds are being used. Holt says there are 1,108 people on waiting lists for long-term care and 550 are in hospital beds waiting for a place in a nursing home. The Liberals also pledged to raise the "comfort and clothing allowance" for seniors from $150 to $200, and develop a strategy to improve support for those living with Alzheimer's disease and dementia. “Our team will ensure that seniors receive the support they need in a way that promotes well-being and independence,” Holt said in a statement. This report by The Canadian Press was first published Oct. 2, 2024. The Canadian Press

title: FOTO / Izraelci se dolaze fotografirati s neeksplodiranim projektilima
content: Teheran je ispalio oko 200 balističkih projektila na Izrael manje od 24 sata nakon što je izraelska vojska pokrenula kopnenu operaciju protiv Hezbollaha u južnom Libanonu. Sustav Iron Dome presreo je većinu raketa, tvrde Izraelci. Iranske oružane snage priopćile su da će ciljati na “baze i interese” pristaša Izraela u regiji ako izravno interveniraju protiv Teherana . Izrael je obećao osvetu te nastavio s operacijama u Libanonu. Kako javlja Times of Izrael , izraelska vojska potvrdila je da je iranski napad oštetio “uredske zgrade i druga područja održavanja u trima bazama koje ne utječu na funkcioniranje vojske. Fotografije u nastavku nastale su na jugu države, kod grada Arada. Nijedan zrakoplov izraelskih zračnih snaga nije oštećen u napadu, a sve pogotke projektila u izraelske zračne baze smatramo neučinkovitima”, kažu iz IDF-a. S druge strane iranski ministar obrane, brigadni general Aziz Nasirzadeh , ustvrdio da je 90% iranskih projektila uspjelo probiti izraelsku obranu i da su gađali samo vojne objekte. title: Berliner Handballer Drux: Karriere mit 29 Jahren zu Ende – „Tut unfassbar weh“
content: Drama um Paul Drux: Der langjährige Nationalspieler – vorbildlicher Kämpfer, sportliches Stehaufmännchen und Publikumsliebling bei den Füchsen Berlin – muss mit nur 29 Jahren seine Karriere beenden. Eine Knieverletzung, die der Rückraumspieler in der vergangenen Woche im Training erlitten hatte, zwingt Drux zur Aufgabe. „Das Ergebnis der Untersuchungen ist für mich sehr niederschmetternd, das muss ich für mich jetzt erst einmal verarbeiten“, sagte Drux: „Ich bin sehr dankbar für das, was ich im als Spieler erleben und erreichen durfte.“ Details zu seiner Verletzung wurden am Mittwoch nicht genannt. Mit dem gebürtigen Gummersbacher verliert der deutsche Handball einen beispiellosen Kämpfer. Einen, der den Teamerfolg stets an Nummer eins stellte. Einen, der sich für Klub und Nationalmannschaft in jeden Zweikampf schmiss, als wäre es sein letzter. Und einen, der sich nach etlichen schweren Verletzungen immer wieder zurückgekämpft hatte. Nun hat Drux den Kampf gegen seinen eigenen Körper verloren. „Diese Nachricht macht mich sehr traurig“, sagte Nationalmannschaftskapitän Johannes Golla. Drux habe „mehr als die vergangenen zehn Jahre des deutschen Handballs mitgeprägt“. Doch statt für weitere sportliche Schlagzeilen zu sorgen, wird Drux nun als einer der größten Pechvögel des deutschen Handballs in die Geschichte eingehen. „Es tut mir unfassbar weh, dass Paul auf diesem Wege seine Karriere beenden muss. Er ist für uns nicht nur Kapitän, sondern auch Vorbild...

title: Tko je 16-godišnji dinamovac koji je danas potopio Monaco? Već je dobio priliku i u seniorima
creator: Telesport
content: juniori danas su u Zaprešiću svladali u 2. kolu , odnosno, Lige prvaka u njihovoj dobnoj konkurenciji, a jedini pogodak zabio je 16-godišnji . Poentirao je u 63. na asistenciju i tako se upisao u strijelce samo minutu nakon što je ušao u igru, a time je treneru pokazao da itekako može računati na njega. Međutim, Banović je toga već itekako svjestan; Horvat je, premda ima tek 16 godina, ove sezone odigrao već sedam utakmica za juniore u domaćem prvenstvu te zabio jedan pogodak, a treba napomenuti da je u četiri navrata ušao kao zamjena. U prošloj kampanji većinom je igrao za kadete te jednom nastupio za juniore, no već ima iskustvo i s prvom momčadi. Dinamo won their first match of the UEFA Youth League after they defeated Monaco 1-0. Patrik Horvat's goal from the 63rd minute was enough for Dinamo to get their first three points of the campaign. Let's hope the senior team can do the same tonight. 🚨 — 🇭🇷 (@TheCroatianLad) Naime, bivši trener vodio ga je na ovoljetne pripreme s Dinamovim seniorima, a Horvat, po vokaciji lijevi krilni igrač, i ondje se istaknuo pa je tako u pripremnoj utakmici protiv zabio i asistirao u visokoj pobjedi (6-2). Plave su protiv Monaca nosili igrači koji već imaju iskustva u službenim nastupima za seniore — a to su , i — no vidimo da momci s Maksimira posjeduju još dosta potencijala u omladinskom pogonu.

title: 10 Rules You Didn’t Know the “Love Is Blind” Contestants Have to Follow
creator: People
content: Netflix's 'Love Is Blind' season 7 premiered in October 2024 and the contestants have to follow these 10 rules Courtesy of Netflix has taken going on a blind date to a new level — and viewers can't get enough. The Netflix reality show has skyrocketed in popularity since it first premiered in 2020. Fans collectively watched more than 6 billion minutes of the show following the season 6 premiere in February 2024, according to , and the streaming service could see even higher numbers for , which premiered in October 2024. The premise of is fairly simple. 30 eligible singles — 15 men and 15 women — spend 10 days going on pod dates where they can't see or touch the person they're talking to. Based entirely on the conversations they've shared in the pods, the couples who have forged strong connections decide if they're ready to get engaged. Then, and only then, are they allowed to meet face-to-face. Following the proposal, the couples — who have been living in sorority and fraternity-esque housing facilities — enjoy a honeymoon-like vacation before moving in together and planning a wedding. If they make it to the altar, it's there that they decide to say "I do" or "I don't." Here are 10 of the rules, including the guidelines for their televised weddings. Courtesy of Netflix Producers kick off the show with speed dating. Cast members get roughly 15 minutes with each person of the opposite sex. From there, the participants are allowed to request who their subsequent dates are with....

title: À Vannes, un concours d’écaillers pour une place en finale nationale à Paris
content: C’est toujours impressionnant de voir avec quelle dextérité les écaillers ou professionnels ostréicoles ouvrent les huîtres, palourdes et autres coquillages. Le grand public va pouvoir apprécier leur savoir-faire à l’occasion du concours régional des écaillers qui aura lieu ce mardi 8 octobre sur l’esplanade du port à Vannes, de 14 h à 18 h 30, veille des Rencontres nationales conchylicoles et des cultures marines qui se dérouleront au parc Chorus les mercredi 9 et jeudi 10 octobre. Dix écaillers seront ainsi en lice pour cette manche régionale du concours national. Sept régions du littoral y sont inscrites. Objectif pour les dix candidats : se qualifier pour la finale qui aura lieu à Paris. Sur place, de 13 h à 20 h, le public pourra apprécier le talent de chacun et déguster les différents produits de la mer ou profiter de la vente à emporter. Après l’inauguration et prises de parole à partir de 13 h, le concours débutera à 14 h 30 et se poursuivra jusqu’à 18 h, suivi de la remise des prix à 18 h 30. Concours national des écaillers, mardi 8 octobre, à partir de 13 h, sur l’esplanade du port à Vannes. Entrés gratuite.

title: Столиця нагородила кращих працівників сфери освіти (фото)
content: Мер Києва вручив 58 відзнак від столиці найкращим працівникам галузі та тим освітянам, хто сьогодні стоїть на захисті держави Сьогодні, 2 жовтня у столичній мерії пройшло нагородження кращих освітян міста. Викладачі, вчителі та прфесори отримали відзнаки найкращих працівники галузі з нагоди професійного свята яке в Україні відзначатимуть у неділю, 6 жовтня. Про це повідомляє пресслужба КМДА. «Сьогодні столична освітянська спільнота об’єднує 65 тис. працівників, які забезпечують діяльність понад 1000 закладів освіти міста. Із них – понад 38 тис. педагогічних працівників. Уже третій рік поспіль новий навчальний рік Київ розпочав в умовах воєнного стану. У цей складний для країни час перед педагогами постав новий виклик – навчати дітей в умовах війни. Освітяни Києва продовжують тримати свій фронт 24/7. Вони навчають, прибирають, годують, забезпечують комфорт учнів та вихованців і життєдіяльність закладів освіти. Дбають про безпеку і життя дітей», – зазначив мер Києва Віталій Кличко . Мер столиці зауважив, що сьогодні частина працівників галузі тримають не тільки освітній фронт. Майже 500 столичних освітян, із них 236 педагогів, захищають Україну на фронті. 22 освітяни загинули. Зниклими безвісти вважаються 7 захисників. Хвилиною мовчання присутні у залі вшанували пам’ять полеглих воїнів. У вересні цього року до столичних закладів освіти пішли загалом 372 тис. учнів та вихованців. Зокрема, до садочків – майже 58 тис. дітей. У школах навчається 281 тис....

title: Финны отказываются работать на Сайменском канале из-за патрулей "Русича"
content: В Финляндии некоторые сотрудники компании по эксплуатации Сайменского канала отказались работать на арендованной у России территории водной артерии из-за приграничных патрулей диверсионно-штурмовой разведывательной группы (ДШРГ) "Русич". Финские работники обеспокоены мыслью о том, что их захватят силы "Русича", сообщает телерадиокомпания Yle в среду, 2 октября. Информацию о патрулях "Русича" у российско-финляндской границы, появившуюся в начале сентября, финские власти обсуждали с российской стороной, сообщила министр транспорта и связи Лулу Ранне в ответ на запрос депутата от Социал-демократической партии Финляндии Суны Кюмяляйнен. Отмечается, что комиссар Сайменского канала и Пограничная служба Финляндии контролируют ситуацию в районе водной артерии и "нет оснований подозревать, что Россия нарушила международные соглашения между Финляндией и РФ". Речь идёт в том числе о соглашении по Сайменскому каналу, которое было заключено между Хельсинки и Москвой ещё в СССР. Совещательная комиссия по Сайменскому каналу призвала власти разработать инструкции для финских сотрудников, работающих на арендованной территории, говорится в публикации . ДШРГ "Русич" в начале сентября заявила, что официально вступила во взаимодействие с погранслужбой ФСБ по "усилению границы с Финляндией" и опубликовала фото, на которых бойцы "Русича" позируют на берегу Сайменского канала у шлюза "Ряттиярви" ("Цветочное") всего в 5 км от финской границы. Это чрезвычайно озаботило...

title: Taylor Swift missing in boyfriend Travis Kelce's games; finally the reasons for that are out
content: Taylor Swift visiting the stadiums frequently during the NFL games featuring her partner and Kansas City Chiefs star Travis Kelce hogged all the limelight during Super Bowl. However, as the new season has commenced, Eras Tour singer seems not to be a regular attendee during the football matches. This has led to the rise of speculations on the social media about the couple's relationship status. However, Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce do not have any kind of problems between themselves whatsoever, according to a report on Cosmopolitan. Also Read : US election 2024 under threat? What is concerning White House race between Kamala Harris and Donald Trump? The absence of Taylor Swift during the games of Travis Kelce's team Chiefs against the Falcons on September 22 and against the Charges on September 29 was due to Taylor Swift’s preparation ahead of her Era’s tour and she was also dealing with some security concerns, reported Cosmopolitan. According to a source of Page Six, Taylor Swift has been really busy regarding her preparations and rehearsals for her upcoming Eras Tour show in Miami which will be taking place on October 18. Apart from that Taylor Swift only prefers to attend Travis Kelce’s NFL games in his home ground which is the Arrowhead Stadium because security is comparatively easier to manage. title: Olivia Rodrigo Sets GUTS World Tour Concert Special at Netflix
creator: Christy Pina
content: Good 4 . The Grammy-winning artist has set her first concert special at for her GUTS World Tour. The streamer announced Wednesday that it would be releasing Rodrigo’s concert film later this month. “From the Intuit Dome in Los Angeles, she’ll sing songs from her latest album, , and her debut album, ,” the logline reads. “In this exhilarating concert special, get a look at Olivia on her GUTS world tour and experience her powerful performances about heartbreak and betrayal.” The singer-songwriter kicked off her second tour in Palm Springs in February and continues until March 2025. The sold-out, 95-date tour spans venues across America, Europe, the U.K., Asia and Australia. Along the way, she has performed at renowned venues like Madison Square Garden, The O2 in London, Los Angeles’ Kia Forum, Paris’ Accor Arena and more. “I am so excited to share the GUTS World Tour with my fans,” Rodrigo said in a statement. “For those of you who didn’t get a chance to rock out in-person, now you can have the best seats in the house! And to the fans who cheered, screamed, and danced with me, I am so glad we get to do it all over again!” The tour is in support of her second album, , which follows her breakout album and features pop-punk hits like “bad idea right?” “all american bitch” and “get him back!” , on the other hand, included slower ballads like “deja vu,” “drivers license” and “hope ur ok.” James Merryman directs the concert special, which is produced by Aleen Keshishian and Blink,...

title: Kleindienst zur Nationalmannschaft? Seoane kommentiert Gerücht
