title: Donald Trump comenta sobre los ataques a Israel por Irán
creator: Redacción 24 Horas
content: El candidato a la presidencia de los Estados Unidos, el empresario Donald Trump, lanzó un comunicado oficial expresando su opinión acerca de los ataques con misiles iraníes a Israel. Tras el ataque con misiles orquestados por la República Islámica de Irán hacia el Estado de Israel; el expresidente Donald Trump, comenta sobre el ataque, agitando la amenaza de una posible Tercera Guerra Mundial. Te puede interesar: Shakira anuncia conciertos en México: CDMX, Guadalajara y Monterrey Por su parte, el Asesor de Seguridad Nacional de Estados Unidos, Jake Sullivan, promete llegar a las concecuencias con Teherán. El funcionario asegura que las fuerzas armadas de Estados Unidos estarán dispuestas a apoyar a Israel en caso de que lo requiera y que reitera que el ataque iraní fue una escalada más en el conflicto que se vive en Medio Oriente. En el comunicado de Trump difundido a través de redes sociales, el candidato a la presidencia comenta que bajo su mandato, nunca hubo guerra en Europa, ni en Medio Oriente o en Asia, y que los conflictos armados en la actualidad son culpa de la incompetencia de Biden y Kamala. El magnate asegura que las acciones que están ocurriendo actualmente nos están llevando al borde de una Tercera Guerra Mundial. Por otra parte, el aspirante a la vicepresidencia, James David Vance, posiblemente haga eco a las declaraciones de Trump durante el avance de su campaña. Mike Pence, ex vicepresidente de los Estados Unidos, tras el ataque iraní contra...

title: Η Αντζελίνα Τζολί επιβεβαίωσε τις φήμες για νέα σχέση - Ποιος είναι ο νέος της σύντροφος
content: Η (Angelina Jolie) επισημοποίησε - άθελα της - τη σχέση της στο Instagram με τον φημολογούμενο σύντροφό της, τον Βρετανό ράπερ και πολιτικό ακτιβιστή, Akala. Το Σαββατοκύριακο που μας πέρασε, ο 40χρονος καλλιτέχνης που διοργάνωσε η 49χρονη ηθοποιός για Ο Akala φαίνεται σε μια φωτογραφία στην ίδια σειρά φωτογραφιών. Η ηθοποιός έπαιρνε συνέντευξη από τον Mustafa στον εκθεσιακό χώρο Atelier Jolie στην «Great Jones Street». Η φορούσε γκρι κοστούμι και μαύρες μπότες, ενώ ο Akala ένα καθώς βρισκόταν στο ακροατήριο. Αυτό συμβαίνει δύο ημέρες αφού ο Akala συνόδευσε την Τζολί στην πρεμιέρα της ταινίας «Maria» στο 62ο Φεστιβάλ Κινηματογράφου της Νέας Υόρκης. Η Τζολί έχει εμφανιστεί αρκετές φορές εν μέσω της από τον , αν και πηγές έχουν δηλώσει στο People ότι είναι απλώς φίλοι. Angelina Jolie, 49, and British rapper 'boyfriend' Akala, 40, go Instagram official Η ηθοποιός πυροδότησε φήμες για ειδύλλιο με τον ράπερ όταν το ζευγάρι εθεάθη να βγαίνει από το ξενοδοχείο της στην Ιταλία κατά τη διάρκεια του Διεθνούς Φεστιβάλ Κινηματογράφου της Βενετίας τον Αύγουστο. Το «In Touch» είχε υποστηρίξει ότι η ηθοποιός έβλεπε κρυφά τον μουσικό για « ». Οι φήμες ξεκίνησαν για πρώτη φορά όταν ο Akala συνόδευσε την Τζολί και τις κόρες της Ζαχάρα και Σιλό στο λογοτεχνικό φεστιβάλ Calabash στην Τζαμάικα τον Μάιο του περασμένου έτους. title: Haguenau. Immersion à l’hôpital, un microcosme dans la ville
content: Dans le bâtiment femme-enfant, samedi 28 septembre, les enfants sont venus en nombre sur le stand installé au service de gynécologie du centre hospitalier de Haguenau (CHH). Objectif : s’assurer de la bonne santé de leur doudou ! À l’étage, même engouement lors de la visite en famille des salles d’accouchement. Une moyenne de 1 200 naissances y a lieu chaque année, et pour certaines visiteuses, le moment a pris une tournure nostalgique. Dans le...

title: Το Inside Out 2 συνεχίζει να καταρρίπτει όλα τα ρεκόρ - Τα νούμερα μιλούν από μόνα τους!
content: Η άκρως επιτυχημένη animation «Inside Out 2» (Τα μυαλά που κουβαλάς) συνεχίζει και μετά τις 25 Σεπτεμβρίου, ημέρα από την οποία είναι διαθέσιμη στην πλατφόρμα Disney +. Η συνέχεια της ταινίας του 2015 αναδείχθηκε όσον αφορά τις πωλήσεις των εισιτηρίων το 2024, με εισπράξεις 1,6 δισεκατομμύρια δολάρια παγκοσμίως. Η επιτυχία της έχει μεταφερθεί και στην πλατφόρμα streaming και έγινε των Walt Disney Animation Studios στο Disney + από την πρεμιέρα του «Encanto» το 2021. The highest grossing animated movie of all time, Disney’s , drew 30.5 million views worldwide on Disney in its first five days, not only becoming the No. 1 film premiere YTD, but even more. ‘Inside Out 2’s viewership is the best film premiere on Disney+ since Walt... Οι θεάσεις της σε παγκόσμιο επίπεδο στην πλατφόρμα . Σύμφωνα με το Deadline το «Inside Out 2» έγινε . H ταινία της και της επιστρέφει στο μυαλό της εφήβου Ράιλι, τη στιγμή που το κέντρο ελέγχου κατεδαφίζεται ώστε να δημιουργηθεί χώρος για κάτι εντελώς απροσδόκητο, τα νέα Συναισθήματα! Eμφανίζεται η Ανησυχία και φέρνει μαζί της την Ντροπή, τη Ζήλια και την Ανία.

title: Regula Ayuntamiento de Tlaxcala comercio ambulante de las Calles Zitlapopócatl y Guillermo Barroso
creator: Redacción Sintesis
content: En atención a las peticiones de ciudadanos, organizaciones civiles, representantes de la iniciativa privada y con base en dictámenes de Protección Civil y del Bando de Policía y Gobierno, el Ayuntamiento de Tlaxcala llevó a cabo la madrugada de este miércoles, el retiro de estructuras de puestos ambulantes que estaban colocadas sobre las calles Zitlapopócatl y Guillermo Barroso, en la capital del estado, con el objetivo de regular el comercio en la ciudad. La medida se implementó en seguimiento a la recomendación emitida por la Coordinación Estatal de Protección Civil ya que, tras un recorrido en la zona por parte de personal de esta dependencia, se detectó que los puestos ambulantes obstruían banquetas y el arroyo vehicular, lo que representaba un riesgo para los peatones que se veían obligados a caminar sobre los carriles de tránsito vehicular. El operativo para comenzar con la regularización, se realizó con base en la Ley de Protección Civil del Estado de Tlaxcala, priorizando la seguridad y la vida de los peatones, así como de los propios comerciantes, ya que la ubicación de los puestos generaba condiciones de peligro para quienes transitan por el área. La acción del Ayuntamiento responde a la necesidad de salvaguardar el bienestar común sin que ello implique una imposición o el impedimento de ejercer una actividad comercial de manera regulada, por lo que ya se busca el diálogo con los comerciantes para que acrediten la posesión de la mercancía...

title: Donald Trump Blocked My Prison Release, Michael Cohen Tells Supreme Court
content: blocked the prison release of his former attorney, , a petition to the has claimed. Cohen is seeking damages from Trump and other federal officials who allegedly conspired to keep him in prison as punishment for writing about Trump in his memoir. Cohen's counsel, Jon-Michael Dougherty, filed the brief to the U.S. Supreme Court on Monday. "The issue is whether the government can revoke a prisoner's approved release to home confinement as punishment for his speech criticizing the president and to prevent further such speech," wrote. He compared the importance of the case to the Supreme Court's legalization of same sex marriage in the Obergefell case. "This case is analogous to this Court's seminal cases protecting Americans' rights, the sorts of cases this Court has not hesitated to review over the centuries. See, e.g., ," Dougherty wrote. The brief asks the justices to accept the case. sought email comment from Trump's attorney on Wednesday. A federal appeals court has already rejected Cohen's attempt to revive his lawsuit against Trump, former Attorney General Bill Barr and other Justice Department officials for allegedly retaliating against him for promoting his anti-Trump memoir. Cohen, who served time in federal prison after pleading guilty to campaign finance charges and lying to , said that he was put into solitary confinement for speaking critically about the former president. His release was quickly ordered after a federal judge found the action "retaliatory," but...

title: Singer Robbie Williams is played by a CGI monkey in first trailer for a bafflingly unique biopic with rave reviews
creator: lauren.milici@futurenet.com (Lauren Milici)
content: This ain't Bohemian Rhapsody. The first trailer for Better Man, starring Robbie Williams as a CGI monkey, has arrived. In the brief clip, which can be viewed below, we see what appears to be your everyday musical biopic – scenes of the artist as a child, performing on stage, and trashing a room – but, uh, in this case, the artist is played by a CGI monkey. Williams explains this choice with a bit of overhead narration: "I know what you’re thinking. What’s with the monkey? I’m Robbie Williams. I’m one of the biggest pop stars in the world. But I’ve always seen myself a little less evolved." According to the official logline, Better Man is "based on the true story of the meteoric rise, dramatic fall, and remarkable resurgence of British pop superstar Robbie Williams, one of the greatest entertainers of all time. It follows Robbie’s journey from childhood, to being the youngest member of chart-topping boyband Take That, through to his unparalleled achievements as a record-breaking solo artist – all the while confronting the challenges that stratospheric fame and success can bring.” Michael Gracey (The Greatest Showman) directs from a screenplay he penned with Oliver Cole and Simon Gleeson. While Williams provides the voiceover, Jonno Davies provides the motion capture for the monkey. Bizarre concept or not, the film has rave reviews and an 86% Fresh rating on Rotten Tomatoes. Better Man had its world premiere at the Telluride Film Festival on August 30. It's slated for a wide...

title: Suspicious device made of 'firework components' deactivated by bomb squad in Florida casino
creator: TOI World Desk
content: A second suspicious device was located and safely deactivated at a casino in Florida by investigating and reviewing surveillance footage . The device was discovered following a thorough search initiated at the Seminole Hard Rock Tampa after the first was found, leading to an intensified security sweep , according to Fox News . The Hillsborough County sheriff’s office bomb disposal team was called in to assist with the deactivation and removal of the device. The second device, made from ' fireworks components ,' was discovered in a men's restroom adjacent to the casino. Authorities confirmed that both devices posed a serious threat, but quick action by law enforcement ensured the situation was resolved without incident. The investigation is ongoing, with officials continuing to review evidence and footage from the casino to determine the origins and purpose of the devices. Casino management praised the swift and professional response of the bomb disposal team and local law enforcement, reassuring patrons that their safety remains a top priority. According to Fox News, all areas of the casino have since been declared safe and have reopened to the public.

title: Israel mata dezenas de pessoas em Gaza, dizem médicos
creator: CdB
content: Por Redação, com Reuters – de Gaza Ataques militares israelenses na Faixa de Gaza mataram ao menos 60 palestinos durante a noite, inclusive em uma escola que abrigava famílias desabrigadas, segundo médicos, enquanto tanques israelenses avançavam em áreas de Khan Younis, no sul do enclave. Os tanques israelenses realizaram um ataque a várias áreas no leste e no centro de Khan Younis, antes de se retirarem parcialmente, deixando ao menos 40 pessoas mortas e dezenas de feridos, de acordo com a rádio oficial Voz da Palestina e a mídia do Hamas. Na Cidade de Gaza, pelo menos 22 palestinos foram mortos, segundo os médicos. Um ataque israelense a uma escola que abrigava famílias desalojadas na Cidade de Gaza matou 17 pessoas, enquanto outro atingiu a Sociedade de Órfãos Al-Amal, que também abriga pessoas desalojadas, matando pelo menos outras cinco pessoas, disseram os médicos. A escalada ocorre depois que o Irã lançou uma salva de mísseis balísticos contra Israel na terça-feira, em retaliação à campanha de Israel contra os aliados do Hezbollah no Líbano, e Israel prometeu uma “resposta dolorosa” contra seu inimigo. Os palestinos na Faixa de Gaza, envolvidos em quase um ano de guerra com Israel, comemoraram ao ver dezenas de foguetes a caminho de Israel. Alguns desses foguetes caíram no enclave palestino após serem interceptados pelas defesas antimísseis de Israel, mas não causaram perdas humanas, segundo testemunhas. O Hezbollah começou a disparar...

title: Someone Asked Selena Gomez What It's Like To Be A Billionaire And She Was Not Having It: 'I Personally Think It's Distasteful.'
content: There are, according to various estimates by people who track such things, somewhere around 3,000 billionaires in the world. That number recently increased as it has been calculated that, thanks to her staggeringly successful cosmetics brand, actress and singer Selena Gomez is now a billionaire . While she has achieved an incredible milestone of success, she’d rather not talk about it. In a clip posted to TikTok, ET asked the Only Murders in the Building star about her new billionaire status. Perhaps unsurprisingly, she’s not that interested in touting her new wealth. She calls discussing money “distasteful” and instead thanks those who helped her achieve this status, those who purchased her Rare Beauty products. Gomez said... I’m very grateful. I personally think it’s distasteful to talk about money. But I really am giving all the credit to the people who buy the products. Whether you have money or you don't have money, plenty of folks don't like talking about the subject. Gomez will never want anything in her life with the wealth she has accumulated, but talking about that fact would have to be weird. While Selena Gomez has likely always had plenty of money, the amount of cash in her bank account probably hasn’t changed all that much in recent years. Her billionaire status, like that of fellow young billionaire Kylie Jenner , is tied up in her cosmetics line. If she sold Rare Beauty, she’d end up with a billion dollars, but as it stands it’s just a valuable thing she owns....

title: Papa Francisc a declarat 7 octombrie zi de rugăciune și post pentru pace
content: Suveranul pontif a declarat că duminică va recita din rozariu şi se va ruga la Fecioara Maria la bazilica Santa Maria Maggiore din Roma. „Pentru a invoca prin mijlocirea Preasfintei Fecioare Maria darul păcii, duminica viitoare voi merge la bazilica Santa Maria Maggiore unde voi recita Sfântul Rozariu şi voi adresa o rugăciune sinceră către Fecioară”, a precizat liderul de la Vatican. „Dacă este posibil, vă rog şi pe voi, membri ai Sinodului, să mi vă alăturaţi cu această ocazie”, a adăugat pontiful argentinian în vârstă de 87 de ani. „Iar a doua zi, pe 7 octombrie, îi rog pe toţi să urmeze o zi de rugăciune şi post pentru pace în lume”, a afirmat papa la finalul omiliei din Piaţa Sfântul Petru de la Vatican, cu ocazia deschiderii summitul global al liderilor catolici, cunoscut sub denumirea de Sinodul Episcopilor.

title: Calendario de farmacias de guardia en Coria para octubre 2024
content: Ampliar Miriam Bañón Coria Necesitas ser suscriptor para acceder a esta funcionalidad. Miércoles, 2 de octubre 2024, 16:46 Necesitas ser suscriptor para acceder a esta funcionalidad. Opciones para compartir Copiar enlace WhatsApp Facebook X (antes Twitter) LinkedIn Telegram Threads El Ayuntamiento de Coria ha publicado el calendario de farmacias de guardia para el mes de octubre. Los vecinos podrán consultar los turnos de las distintas farmacias disponibles durante todo el mes, facilitando así el acceso a los servicios farmacéuticos en cualquier momento. Las farmacias de guardia en octubre son las siguientes: Pascual Echávarri, Ma Mercedes (días 1, 14, 23 y 30 de octubre). Quesada Quesada, Casilda (días 2, 5, 11, 18 y 25 de octubre). Tobajas Pizarro, Ma Rocío (días 8, 10, 16, 22 y 31 de octubre). Valiente Rodríguez, Patricia (días 7, 9, 15, 19 y 26 de octubre). Este calendario garantiza la cobertura de atención farmacéutica de manera continua para los residentes y visitantes de Coria, ofreciendo un servicio esencial para la salud de la comunidad.

title: Mayor Adams flashes thumbs up as he passes hecklers on return to court: ‘Resign!’
creator: Steven Vago, Emily Crane
content: Mayor Eric Adams gave a thumbs up as he returned to Manhattan federal court Wednesday — where prosecutors said he will likely face an expanded indictment accusing him of taking bribes and illegal campaign contributions. “We think that is quite likely,” prosecutor Hagan Scotten told the judge when asked if the feds planned to file what’s known as a “superseding indictment” in the case. The prosecutor said it’s “likely additional defendants will be charged,” and that it’s “possible” that the new indictment would include more charges against the mayor. The bombshell development came soon after Hizzoner was heckled making his way into Manhattan federal court ahead of the 10:30 a.m. procedural hearing. “Resign! The whole administration,” one man raged. “Criminal. You’re a criminal. You’re a sellout. Resign, sucker.”

title: ICC Women's T20 World Cup 2024: Players to watch out for
creator: Rajdeep Saha
content: The 2024 ICC Women's T20 World Cup is set to commence, with 10 teams vying for the coveted trophy. The tournament will run from October 2 to October 20. As the competition draws near, six players have been identified as potential game-changers for their respective teams. These athletes are expected to play a pivotal role in determining the outcome of this prestigious event. Here we decode the top players to watch out for. Beth Mooney (Australia) Beth Mooney , a seasoned opener for Australia, is currently leading the ICC's T20 Rankings among batters. The 30-year-old has been instrumental in Australia's previous three T20 World Cup victories and was named 'Player of the Series' in 2020. In a recent warm-up match against England in Dubai, she scored an impressive 50 from just 30 balls, indicating her readiness for the upcoming tournament. As per ESPNcricinfo , Mooney owns 2,858 runs in WT20Is at an average of 39.69. Sophie Ecclestone (England) Sophie Ecclestone , a 25-year-old left-arm spinner from England, is a major star attraction. She is currently the highest-ranked bowler in both the ICC's T20 and ODI Rankings. In June, she became the youngest bowler to take 100 ODI wickets. Ecclestone owns a total of 126 T20I wickets at 14.65. She is the 4th-highest wicket-taker in the format and is England's best bowler. Deepti Sharma (India) Deepti Sharma , a 27-year-old all-rounder from India, is also among the players to watch. She is currently ranked second among T20 bowlers...

title: Indian stock market investors richer by ₹110.5L crore in 2024
creator: Dwaipayan Roy
content: Indian investors have witnessed a significant increase in their wealth this year, with a surge of ₹110.57 lakh crore. This substantial growth is attributed to an exceptional rally in the stock market , where benchmark indices have broken numerous records. The market capitalization of BSE-listed companies has risen to ₹474.86 lakh crore, marking a new high for the year on September 27 at ₹477.93 lakh crore. Sensex records significant growth The Sensex has experienced a substantial increase of 16.64% or 12,026.03 points in 2024, providing investors with impressive returns. The benchmark reached its highest ever level of 85,978.25 points on September 27 this year. Santosh Meena from Swastika Investmart Ltd, attributes this market rally to strong domestic liquidity and solid economic fundamentals in India. Midcap and smallcap indices outperform in 2024 Despite selling pressure from Foreign Institutional Investors (FIIs), the Indian equity markets have reached record highs. Meena noted, "The midcap and smallcap indices outperformed and several stocks turned into multibaggers, rewarding retail investors handsomely." The BSE midcap index has surged by 34.32% or 12,645.24 points this year, while the smallcap index soared by 34.62% or 14,777.09 points. Sensex surpassed historic milestones in September The 30-share BSE benchmark crossed the 83,000-level for the first time on September 17, and surpassed the historic 84,000-mark on September 20. It further climbed above the 85,000-level...

title: Andre Russell vents frustration over TKR's exit from CPL 2024
creator: Rajdeep Saha
content: Andre Russell , the star player of Trinbago Knight Riders (TKR), has expressed his disappointment after his team's unexpected exit from the Caribbean Premier League (CPL) 2024. The elimination was a result of their loss to Barbados Royals in a match at Providence Stadium, Guyana. The game was marred by an unforeseen floodlight failure that disrupted play and ultimately influenced the result. This incident left both Russell and TKR fans upset. Floodlight failure disrupts TKR's momentum The floodlight failure occurred when TKR were at a strong 168/3 with just one ball remaining in their innings. This unexpected power outage not only interrupted their momentum but also caused a significant delay, leading to a major shift in the match's dynamics. The officials were forced to use the DLS method due to this disruption, setting a considerably reduced target of just 60 runs for the Royals in five overs. Russell questions fairness of match decision The revised target left TKR players visibly upset, particularly Russell who felt the situation was unfair to his team. Defending a modest target in a T20 match is always challenging, and TKR's bowlers struggled to contain a powerful Barbados Royals batting lineup. Despite an early breakthrough by Sunil Narine and a brief moment of hope when Chris Jordan almost dismissed Rovman Powell, the momentum shifted against TKR. Miller's explosive batting seals victory for Royals David Miller 's aggressive 50* off just 17 deliveries, including five...

title: 'Beautiful girls prefer jobholders, not farmers': Maharashtra MLA's shocking remarks
creator: Chanshimla Varah
content: A video clip of a speech given by an MLA from Maharashtra 's Amravati district has gone viral on social media for allegedly demeaning women and farmers. In the video, Devendra Bhuyar is heard saying that beautiful girls only settle for someone with a job (when choosing her husband). Bhuyar stated in his speech that salaried boys get smart girls while paan shop owners, grocers, and traders end up with number two or not-so-good-looking girls. Bhuyar's comments spark controversy He added that the remaining "ugly" girls or number three are married off to sons of farmers, who he described as "really unfortunate." These remarks have ignited a firestorm of controversy. Shiv Sena (Uttar Bharat Teerth) leader Shushma Andhare has publicly criticized Bhuyar for his comments, describing them as an insult to the sons of the soil. Shiv Sena (UBT) leader criticizes Bhuyar's remarks Congress leader and former Maharashtra women and child development minister, Yashomati Thakur, has also slammed Bhuyar, an independent MLA from Warud-Morshi and supporter of deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar , for the derogatory remarks. "Ajit Pawar and those in power should keep their MLAs under control. No one will tolerate such categorization of women. Society will teach you a lesson," said Thakur, who is an MLA from the same district.

One of its biggest successes is that it taps into many people's fantasies of building their dream home from scratch or renovating an old building. Grand Designs has been going for 25 years now, having first hit our screens in 1999, and it will continue to fascinate people for years to come. That alone is enough proof that there is a lot of risk involved from those taking part, from human relationships to the money involved. We delve into the secrets off camera that creates the magic of the show. The Grand Design episodes are like mini films in themselves and each episode takes at least a year to shoot and one build took as long as ten years. Often the builds take far longer than the people embarking on the journey expect it to. As you can imagine, it's important for the series to keep each of their projects tightly under wraps until they are ready. "Some projects take five years, some take three, others take 18 months," Grand Designs presenter Kevin McCloud told This Morning in 2021. "They're ready when they're ready. Consequently, our series could be anywhere between four and nine projects, depending on what’s done." There's a lot of waiting around for the perfect moment to shoot the scenes too when it comes to days on...

title: Wojciech Szczesny signs with Barcelona a month after retirement: Details
creator: Rajdeep Saha
content: Wojciech Szczesny , the former Arsenal and Juventus goalkeeper, has signed a contract with Barcelona until the end of the season. This surprising move comes just over a month after his retirement from professional football. The 34-year-old Polish international announced his retirement on August 27, following the termination of his contract with Juventus. Here are the key details. Szczesny's return prompted by Ter Stegen's injury Szczesny's return to professional football was prompted by Barcelona's need for a replacement after their first-choice goalkeeper, Marc-Andre ter Stegen, suffered a serious knee injury. The injury occurred during their 5-1 victory against Villarreal last month. Despite a recent 4-2 loss to Osasuna , Barcelona remain at the top of the table with seven wins from eight games. A look at Szczesny's illustrious career Szczesny began his career at Arsenal, making 181 appearances after joining the club as a 16-year-old. He also had stints at Brentford (28 matches) and AS Roma (81 matches) before moving to Juventus in 2017. During his seven-year tenure in Turin, he made 252 appearances and won three Serie A titles and three Coppas Italia. The Warsaw-born player earned 84 caps for Poland, participating in four European Championships and two World Cups. Szczesny's retirement and potential debut for Barcelona Upon announcing his retirement, Szczesny stated: "Today, though my body still feels ready for challenges, my heart is not there anymore. I feel that right...

title: Buscan a un hombre de 32 años, en Las Grutas: su padre es un dirigente de la UCR en San Nicolás
creator: Rodrigo Sandoval
content: La comunidad de Las Grutas y San Nicolás se encuentra conmocionada por la desaparición de Hugo Leandro Gorgone, un hombre de 32 años, oriundo de San Nicolás pero residente actual en la localidad balnearia en Río Negro. Su padre es un referente político de la localidad bonaerense. Qué se sabe. Hugo Leandro Gorgone es hijo del destacado dirigente del radicalismo , Hugo René Gorgone, quien viajó a Las Grutas para seguir de cerca la búsqueda de su hijo. El joven fue visto por última vez el domingo 29 de septiembre entre las 15 y las 16, cuando s e movilizaba en una motocicleta tipo enduro de la marca Zanella, color negro, con detalles en rojo y blanco. El último lugar donde se lo vio fue en la estación de GNC de la localidad, desde donde aparentemente continuó su viaj e. Su motocicleta fue hallada el martes por la tarde en la zona rural de Valcheta, pero hasta el momento no hay rastros de su paradero. Hugo Leandro Gorgone mide aproximadamente 1,80 metros, es delgado, de tez blanca y tiene el pelo ondulado. Al momento de su desaparición, vestía ropa oscura. No posee tatuajes, piercings ni otros elementos distintivos visibles. La familia solicitó a toda persona que pueda tener información sobre su paradero que se comunique con la Unidad Policial más cercana o llame a los números 911, 2920-601697 o 2934-497096. Desde el Ministerio Público Fiscal de Río Negro informaron que la búsqueda de Gorgone comenzó inmediatamente tras reportarse su desaparición . La...

title: Helene's flooding swept away 11 workers at a Tennessee factory. Now the state is investigating
content: NASHVILLE, Tenn. -- Tennessee state authorities said Wednesday they are investigating the company behind a plastics factory where 11 workers were swept away by flooding from the remnants of Hurricane Helene. As the nearby Nolichucky River swelled from rainfall, employees in the Impact Plastics factory in Erwin, a small community in rural Tennessee, kept working. Several asserted that they weren’t allowed to leave in time to avoid the storm’s impact. It wasn’t until water flooded into the parking lot and the power went out that the plant shut down and sent workers home. Several never made it. The raging waters swept 11 people away, and only five were rescued. Two of them are confirmed dead and are part of a toll across six states that has surpassed 160. Four others in the factory are still missing since they were washed away Friday in Erwin, where dozens of people were also rescued off the roof of a hospital. Tennessee Bureau of Investigation spokesperson Leslie Earhart said Wednesday that the agency is investigating allegations involving Impact Plastics at the direction of the local prosecutor. District Attorney Steven R. Finney said in a statement that he asked the bureau to look into any potential criminal violations related to the “occurrences” on Friday. Some workers managed to drive away from the plant, while others got caught on a clogged road where water rose high enough to sweep vehicles away. Videos show the brown floodwaters covering the nearby highway and lapping...

title: Hrvatski grad pod ratnim uzbunama, a onda se dogodio incident pred uzvrat
creator: Gordan Šojat
content: Hrvatski grad pod ratnim uzbunama, a onda se dogodio incident pred uzvrat Hajduk je zadnju put kao predstavnik Jugoslavije u nekom europskom kupu nastupio prije 33 godine, kada su ‘Bili’ gostovali na stadionu White Hart Lane u Londonu kod Tottenhama, u uzvratu prvog kola Kupa kupova. Jedna obljetnica, za sladokusce... Hrvatski predstavnik u London otišao je s prednošću od 1:0, koju je stekao dalekometnim projektilom Maria Novakovića iz Linza, jer Hajduk, isto kao i Dinamo, nije mogao nastupiti na svojem stadionu zbog velikosrpske agresije. Igrači i stručni stožer do Linza su putovali prvo brodom do Rijeke, zbog tadašnjeg prekida prometa između juga i sjevera Lijepe naše, a onda dalje put Austrije. Hajduk je tada bio vrlo jaka momčad, u obrani su bili Igor Štimac, Jarni i Bilić pa u vezi Miše, a u napadu Vučević i Kozniku, tako da je plan bio obraniti 1:0 iz prve utakmice i možda još nešto zabiti, no zbog jednog poteza uprave kluba, prije samog puta u London došlo je raspada sistema. Buljan poludio Tih dana trajalo je natezanje između kluba i igrača Gorana Milanka oko potpisivanja novog ugovora, je bio privremeno odstranjen iz prve momčadi, suspendiran, ali ga je uprava kluba odlučila pomilovati i vratiti za uzvrat u Londonu, kako bi Hajduk pokušao proći Tottenham. No tu informaciju nitko nije rekao tadašnjem sportskom direktoru Ivanu Buljanu, koji je odlučio ne putovati u London, kada je vidio kako je među putnicima Goran Milanko. Od nauma nije ga...

title: En Iran, Ali Khamenei anticipe déjà une riposte israéliene
creator: Pascal Airault
content: La tension monte progressivement mais très sûrement entre Israël et l’Iran. Mardi soir, la république islamique a lancé près de 200 missiles balistiques sur le territoire israélien, la veille de Rosh Hachana, la fête juive célébrant la nouvelle année du calendrier hébraïque.

На Урале пытались заживо сжечь 78-летнюю пенсионерку-волонтёра
content: В городе Нижний Тагил в Свердловской области двое мужчин подожгли дверь 78-летней женщины, которая плетёт маскировочные сети для бойцов спецоперации и собирает гуманитарную помощь, сообщил 2 октября Telegram-канал SHOT. Нападение произошло в ночь на 1 октября на улице Красноармейской. Камеры видеонаблюдения зафиксировали, как в подъезд зашли двое мужчин с рюкзаками. Подпалив дверь, они скрылись, вспыхнул сильный пожар. Спасатели вызволили женщину из горящей квартиры через окно. Она получила сильные ожоги и сейчас находится в больнице в тяжёлом состоянии. В огне погибла кошка пенсионерки. Из горящего дома эвакуировали 11 человек, в том числе троих детей. Полиция разыскивает поджигателей. Как сообщало , в конце сентября в Ульяновске мужчина продававшую цветы на улице. Он трижды ударил женщину, сидевшую у входа в магазин, кулаком в лицо и скрылся. Избиение зафиксировала камера видеонаблюдения. МВД возбудило уголовное дело по ст. 213 УК РФ («Хулиганство»). Мужчину

title: Surge in anti-Semitic incidents in UK over past year: Charity
content: More than 5,500 cases of abusive behaviour recorded since war broke out on October 7, the highest-ever yearly tally. The number of anti-Semitic incidents in the United Kingdom has soared since Israel launched its assault on Gaza in response to the Hamas-led attack on October 7, 2023, according to a Jewish charity. The Community Security Trust (CST), which monitors anti-Semitism in the UK, released its latest figures on Wednesday, reporting 5,583 anti-Semitic incidents across the country between October 7, 2023 and September 30, 2024 – the highest tally recorded in any 12-month period since it began its count in 1984. In the month of October 2023 alone, following Hamas’s attack on Israel – in which at least 1,139 people were killed and around 250 were taken as captives, sparking Israel’s retaliatory war on Gaza – the charity logged 1,400 anti-Semitic incidents. CST said that anti-Semitism had gone up 204 percent compared to the previous year, stating in a report focused on the months between January and June that the “unprecedented” spike in abusive behaviour was caused by people directing “their anger over this geopolitical conflict towards British Jews”. “When conflict rages in Israel, anti-Jewish hate rises in the UK,” the charity said on X, alongside a breakdown of its figures, adding that reports of anti-Semitism had been “flooding in” even before Israel’s military retaliation. In its breakdown of anti-Semitic incidents in Britain over the last year, CST categorised...

title: Labour peer Lord Alli under investigation over ‘alleged non-registration of interests’
creator: The Independent
content: , the Labour peer at the centre of the donations row engulfing ’s party, is under investigation over an alleged failure to register interests. He is facing a probe from the House of Lords commissioner for standards over potential breaches of parliamentary rules surrounding openness and accountability in the members’ code of conduct. Lord Alli, who funded clothes and other gifts for the prime minister and his wife, is listed as the subject of an inquiry published today. It comes after Sir Keir, along with a succession of cabinet ministers, from corporate sponsors and millionaire donors. In his role as a peer in the House of Lords, Lord Alli is required to register his interests in accordance with the parliamentary code of conduct. There is no suggestion that the prime minister or members of his Cabinet broke any rules in accepting the freebies from Lord Alli. His donations include £20,000 declared by Sir Keir for accommodation during the election campaign, which the prime minister said was to allow his son to study for his GCSEs in peace at the former TV executive’s central London flat while the family home was surrounded by media. The peer, who also gave money to education secretary Bridget Phillipson to fund a reception to mark her 40th birthday, gave Sir Keir use of the £18 million penthouse, which the prime minister also used to record a -era broadcast urging the public to work from home. The Christmas broadcast aired in December 2021 on the same day new Covid guidance...

title: Capturan a joven responsable de cuatro homicidios en Cúcuta
creator: Yuliana Ruiz
content: 2 de octubre de 2024 Un joven, integrante del grupo delincuencial «Los Menores», fue capturado en la ciudad Cúcuta, en Norte de Santander, por ser el presunto responsable de cuatro homicidios. El suejeto, identificado como Deiner Sánchez Berbesí, respondía a órdenes de «Carlos Pecueca», perpetrando los homicidios selectivos en la comuna 10 de la ciudad para conseguir el control del microtráfico. «Con esta captura se logró el esclarecimiento del suceso ocurrido el 16 de agosto en el barrio Alfonso López donde fueron asesinados Josué Gabriel Velásquez y Deison Hernández Carrizales», precisó el comandante de la Policía Metropolitana de Cúcuta, coronel William Quintero. Subrayó que el delincuente también se encuentra implicado en el doble homicidio ocurrido el pasado 11 de agosto en el barrio Cuberos Niño, en el que fue ultimada una pareja de habitantes de calle. Sánchez Berbesí fue puesto a las órdenes de las autoridades competentes para su judicialización. Jonathan Maldonado

title: Donald Trump Claims He Would Veto National Abortion Ban If Elected
creator: HuffPost
content: Donald Trump said Tuesday that he would veto a federal abortion ban, after months of dodging questions on his abortion stance. “Everyone knows I would not support a federal abortion ban, under any circumstances, and would, in fact, veto it, because it is up to the states to decide based on the will of their voters (the will of the people!),” Trump wrote in an all-caps post on social media. This is the first time the GOP presidential nominee has fully and directly answered the question of whether he would support a national abortion ban since the Supreme Court repealed Roe v. Wade in 2022. During the presidential debate last month, Trump refused to say whether he would support a national ban despite being pressed several times by moderators and Vice President Kamala Harris. In the social media post, Trump reiterated his support for exceptions to abortion bans including for rape, incest and life of the mother. He added that he does not support “the Democrats radical position of late term abortions” including in the “7th, 8th, or 9th month” and “the possibility of execution of the baby after birth.” Trump has repeated the false rhetoric that Democrats support murdering newborns; homicide is illegal in all 50 states and no Democrats are calling for that to change. The former president posted the message as his running mate, Sen. JD Vance (R-Ohio), was asked about his stance on reproductive rights during the vice presidential debate Tuesday night. Vance straight-up lied about his...

title: ലബനാനിൽ നേർക്കുനേർ പോരാട്ടം; ഹിസ്ബുല്ലയുടെ തിരിച്ചടിയിൽ ഇസ്രായേൽ സൈനികൻ കൊല്ലപ്പെട്ടു
creator: മാധ്യമം ലേഖകൻ
content: ബൈറൂത്ത്: തെക്കൻ ലബനാനിൽ ഹിസ്ബുല്ലയും ഇസ്രായേൽ സൈന്യവും നേർക്കുനേർ ഏറ്റുമുട്ടുന്നു. ഹിസ്ബുല്ലയുമായുള്ള ഏറ്റുമുട്ടലിൽ എട്ടു ഇസ്രായേൽ സൈനികൻ കൊല്ലപ്പെട്ടു. ഇസ്രായേൽ പ്രതിരോധ സേന (ഐ.ഡി.എഫ്) തന്നെയാണ് ഇക്കാര്യം അറിയിച്ചത്. നിരവധി സൈനികർക്ക് പരിക്കേറ്റതായും റിപ്പോർട്ടുകളുണ്ട്. സൈനിക സ്ക്വാഡ് കമാൻഡർ ക്യാപ്റ്റൻ ഈതൻ ഇറ്റ്സാക്ക് ഓസ്റ്റർ (22) ഉൾപ്പെടെ എട്ടുപേരാണ് കൊല്ലപ്പെട്ടത്. കൂടുതൽ വിവരങ്ങൾ പുറത്തുവിട്ടിട്ടില്ല. ലബനാനിൽ കരയുദ്ധം തുടങ്ങി ദിവസങ്ങൾക്കുള്ളിലാണ് ഒറ്റദിനം മാത്രം എട്ടു ഇസ്രായേൽ സൈനികർ കൊല്ലപ്പെടുന്നത്. അതേസമയം, മിസൈൽ ആക്രമണത്തിന് തിരിച്ചടിയായി ഇറാന്‍റെ തന്ത്രപ്രധാന കേന്ദ്രങ്ങളിൽ ഇസ്രായേൽ ആക്രമണത്തിന് ഒരുങ്ങുന്നതായി സൂചനയുണ്ട്. ഇസ്രായേൽ പ്രധാനമന്ത്രി ബിന്യമിൻ നെതന്യാഹു സുരക്ഷ തലവന്മാരുമായി അടിയന്തര യോഗം ചേർന്നു. ഇസ്രായേൽ തിരിച്ചടിച്ചാൽ പ്രത്യാഘാതം കനത്തതായിരിക്കുമെന്ന് ഇറാൻ മുന്നറിയിപ്പ് നൽകിയിരുന്നു. ഇസ്രായേൽ സൈന്യത്തിന് നേരെ ഹിസ്ബുല്ല പോരാളികൾ ശക്തമായ ചെറുത്തുനിൽപ്പാണ് നടത്തുന്നത്. ലബനാനിലേക്ക് കഴിഞ്ഞ ദിവസമാണ് ഇസ്രായേൽ സൈന്യം കടന്നുകയറിയത്. ഇസ്രായേലിലെ ഇറാൻ മിസൈലാക്രമണത്തിന് തിരിച്ചടി നൽകുമെന്ന് പ്രധാനമന്ത്രി ബിന്യമിൻ നെതന്യാഹു പ്രഖ്യാപിച്ചിരുന്നു. കൂടുതൽ സൈനികരെ അടിയന്തരമായി മേഖലയിൽ വിന്യസിക്കുകയാണെന്ന് യു.എസും അറിയിച്ചതോടെ മേഖല കൂടുതൽ രക്തരൂഷിതമാകുമെന്ന ആശങ്ക വർധിച്ചു. തെക്കൻ ലബനാനിലേക്ക് കൂടുതൽ സൈന്യത്തെ അയക്കുകയാണെന്ന് ഇസ്രായേൽ അറിയിച്ചു. വ്യോമസേനയുടെയും പീരങ്കിപ്പടയുടെയും പിന്തുണയോടെ 36ാം ഡിവിഷനിലെ മൂന്ന് ബ്രിഗേഡുകളെയാണ് ബുധനാഴ്ച അധികമായി വിന്യസിച്ചത്. കരയാക്രമണം വ്യാപിപ്പിക്കുന്നതിന്റെ ഭാഗമായി കൂടുതൽ ഗ്രാമങ്ങളിൽനിന്ന് ആളുകൾ ഒഴിയാൻ ഇസ്രായേൽ നിർദേശിച്ചു....

title: La Fiscalía constata un incremento de los delitos de violencia de género y de las agresiones sexuales
Police trawl riverbanks in search for mother, 34, missing for three days - as her last known sighting is revealed
content: Police trawl riverbanks in search for mother, 34, missing for three days - as her last known sighting is revealed By Mark Branagan and Rory Tingle, Home Affairs Correspondent For Mailonline Published: 10:40 EDT, 2 October 2024 | Updated: 10:46 EDT, 2 October 2024 e-mail View comments Police divers were today carrying out underwater searches for a missing bride-to-be after finding some of her belongings discarded on a riverbank. Mother of one Victoria Taylor, 34, a nurse, was engaged to be married to her partner Matthew and the couple had just returned from their first family holiday in Majorca. She has now been missing for three days in bad weather after being spotted walking towards the River Derwent, discarding some of her possessions on the way. Her family told MailOnline her disappearance was 'totally out of character' and she had been looking forward to the wedding. No date had been set but the ceremony was to take place at the Roman Catholic Parish church in the market town of Malton, North Yorkshire, where Matthew is regular at Sunday Mass. Victoria Taylor, 34, was last seen at an address in Malton, North Yorkshire, at 9am on Monday Searches of the riverbank in Malton are being carried out by specialist police divers A major operation is currently underway to try and find missing mother Victoria Taylor Victoria, known to family as Vikki, was last seen at home in Malton around 9am on Monday with Matthew and their two-year-old daughter.
